models.Question.question_en: A company uses Amazon SageMaker for its ML pipeline in a production environment. The company has large input data sizes up to 1 GB and processing times up to 1 hour. The company needs near real-time latency. Which SageMaker inference option meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司在生产环境中使用 Amazon SageMaker 进行其机器学习管道。该公司有高达 1 GB 的大输入数据大小和最长 1 小时的处理时间。该公司需要近实时的延迟。哪个 SageMaker 推理选项满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Asynchronous inference is suitable for handling large input data and long processing times while still providing responses without blocking other requests. It allows for near real-time latency, whereas the other options are less suitable given the input size and processing time constraints.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 异步推理适合处理大输入数据和长处理时间，同时仍然提供响应而不阻塞其他请求。它允许近实时的延迟，而其他选项在输入大小和处理时间限制下不太适合。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to classify human genes into 20 categories based on gene characteristics. The company needs an ML algorithm to document how the inner mechanism of the model affects the output. Which ML algorithm meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望根据基因特征将人类基因分类为20个类别。该公司需要一种机器学习算法来记录模型的内部机制如何影响输出。哪种机器学习算法满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Decision trees provide clear transparency into how the model makes decisions, allowing easy documentation of how the inner mechanism influences the output. The other options do not offer this level of interpretability.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 决策树提供了模型如何做出决策的清晰透明度，便于记录内部机制如何影响输出。其他选项则没有提供这种水平的可解释性。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using a pre-trained large language model (LLM) to build a chatbot for product recommendations. The company needs the LLM outputs to be short and written in a specific language. Which solution will align the LLM response quality with the company's expectations?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用预训练的大型语言模型（LLM）来构建一个用于产品推荐的聊天机器人。该公司需要LLM的输出简短且用特定语言书写。哪种解决方案将使LLM的响应质量与公司的期望一致？
models.Question.explanation_en: Adjusting the prompt allows you to specify the desired length and language of the LLM's responses, making it suitable for tailoring the output to meet the company's needs. The other options do not directly control response length or language.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 调整提示可以让您指定LLM响应的期望长度和语言，从而使输出适合满足公司的需求。其他选项并不能直接控制响应的长度或语言。

models.Question.question_en: A law firm wants to build an AI application by using large language models (LLMs). The application will read legal documents and extract key points from the documents. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家律师事务所希望通过使用大型语言模型（LLMs）构建一个AI应用程序。该应用程序将读取法律文件并提取文件中的关键点。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: A summarization chatbot can effectively read legal documents and generate concise versions that highlight key points. This directly addresses the requirement of extracting essential information, unlike the other options, which focus on different tasks.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 一个摘要聊天机器人可以有效地读取法律文件并生成突出关键点的简明版本。这直接满足了提取重要信息的要求，而其他选项则侧重于不同的任务。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use language models to create an application for inference on edge devices. The inference must have the lowest latency possible. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用语言模型创建一个用于边缘设备推理的应用程序。推理必须具有尽可能低的延迟。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Deploying optimized small language models (SLMs) directly on edge devices provides low latency for inference since the computation happens locally, avoiding the delays associated with network communication. The other options either increase latency or are less suitable for edge deployment.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 将优化的小型语言模型（SLMs）直接部署在边缘设备上可以提供低延迟的推理，因为计算在本地进行，避免了与网络通信相关的延迟。其他选项要么增加延迟，要么不太适合边缘部署。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using domain-specific models. The company wants to avoid creating new models from the beginning. The company instead wants to adapt pre-trained models to create models for new, related tasks. Which ML strategy meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用特定领域的模型。该公司希望避免从头开始创建新模型。相反，该公司希望调整预训练模型，以为新的相关任务创建模型。哪种机器学习策略满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Transfer learning allows the company to adapt pre-trained models for new, related tasks, saving time and resources compared to training models from scratch. The other options do not address the goal of reusing existing models.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 迁移学习允许公司调整预训练模型以适应新的相关任务，与从头开始训练模型相比，可以节省时间和资源。其他选项没有解决重用现有模型的目标。

models.Question.question_en:
A company has built an image classification model to predict plant diseases from photos of plant leaves.
The company wants to evaluate how many images the model classified correctly.
Which evaluation metric should the company use to measure the model's performance?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司建立了一个图像分类模型，用于预测植物叶片照片中的植物疾病。
该公司希望评估模型正确分类了多少张图片。
公司应该使用哪种评估指标来衡量模型的性能？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Accuracy measures how many images were correctly classified out of the total images, making it the
appropriate metric for evaluating the performance of an image classification model. The other metrics are
either not suitable for classification tasks or not used for performance evaluation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 准确率衡量了正确分类的图片数量占总图片数量的比例，因此是评估图像分类模型性能的适当指标。其他指标要么不适用于分类任务，要么不用于性能评估。

models.Question.question_en:
A company makes forecasts each quarter to decide how to optimize operations to meet expected demand.
The company uses ML models to make these forecasts.
An AI practitioner is writing a report about the trained ML models to provide transparency and explainability
to company stakeholders.
What should the AI practitioner include in the report to meet the transparency and explainability
requirements?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司每个季度进行预测，以决定如何优化运营以满足预期需求。
该公司使用机器学习模型来进行这些预测。
一位人工智能从业者正在撰写关于训练过的机器学习模型的报告，以向公司利益相关者提供透明度和可解释性。
为了满足透明度和可解释性要求，人工智能从业者应该在报告中包含什么内容？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Partial Dependence Plots (PDPs) are a powerful tool for understanding and explaining how the features in
a machine learning model impact predictions. They are often used to meet transparency and explainability
requirements for stakeholders. Let's go over why this is the correct choice, along with why the other options
are less suitable:
Partial Dependence Plots (PDPs)
Purpose: PDPs show the relationship between a feature (or multiple features) and the model's predicted
output, which helps to explain the effect of each feature on the model’s predictions.
Explainability: By visualizing how each feature influences the prediction, stakeholders can better
understand how the model works and why it makes certain predictions. This level of interpretability is
essential for gaining trust from non-technical stakeholders.
Transparency: PDPs improve transparency by providing an intuitive way to analyze and present the effects
of individual features.
models.Question.explanation_cn:
部分依赖图（PDPs）是理解和解释机器学习模型中各特征如何影响预测的强大工具。它们通常用于满足利益相关者的透明度和可解释性要求。让我们来看看为什么这是正确的选择，以及其他选项为什么不太合适：
部分依赖图（PDPs）
目的：PDPs 显示特征（或多个特征）与模型预测输出之间的关系，这有助于解释每个特征对模型预测的影响。
可解释性：通过可视化每个特征如何影响预测，利益相关者可以更好地理解模型的工作原理以及为什么会做出某些预测。这种可解释性对于赢得非技术利益相关者的信任至关重要。
透明度：PDPs 通过提供一种直观的方式来分析和呈现各个特征的影响，从而提高透明度。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building a solution to generate images for protective eyewear. The solution must have high accuracy and must minimize the risk of incorrect annotations. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在开发一个用于生成护目镜图像的解决方案。该解决方案必须具有高准确性，并且必须最小化错误标注的风险。哪种解决方案将满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Human-in-the-loop validation ensures high accuracy by involving human reviewers to verify and correct annotations, minimizing the risk of errors in the generated images. The other options are not directly relevant for ensuring annotation accuracy in image generation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 通过人在环验证可确保高准确性，通过让人类审阅者验证和纠正标注，最小化生成图像中错误的风险。其他选项对于确保图像生成中的标注准确性并不直接相关。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to create a chatbot by using a foundation model (FM) on Amazon Bedrock. The FM needs to access encrypted data that is stored in an Amazon S3 bucket. The data is encrypted with Amazon S3 managed keys (SSE-S3). The FM encounters a failure when attempting to access the S3 bucket data. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过在 Amazon Bedrock 上使用基础模型 (FM) 来创建一个聊天机器人。该 FM 需要访问存储在 Amazon S3 存储桶中的加密数据。数据使用 Amazon S3 管理的密钥 (SSE-S3) 进行加密。当 FM 尝试访问 S3 存储桶数据时遇到故障。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: The foundation model needs the appropriate permissions to decrypt the encrypted data in the S3 bucket. Ensuring that the role used by Amazon Bedrock has permission to access and decrypt the data will resolve the access failure. The other options are not suitable for addressing the encryption and permission issue.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 基础模型需要适当的权限来解密 S3 存储桶中的加密数据。确保 Amazon Bedrock 使用的角色具有访问和解密数据的权限将解决访问失败的问题。其他选项不适合解决加密和权限问题。

models.Question.question_en:
A company is building a contact center application and wants to gain insights from customer conversations.
The company wants to analyze and extract key information from the audio of the customer calls.
Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司正在构建一个呼叫中心应用程序，并希望从客户对话中获得洞察。
该公司希望分析并提取客户通话音频中的关键信息。
哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Amazon Transcribe converts audio recordings into text, which allows for further analysis and extraction of
key information from customer conversations. The other options do not directly handle audio transcription or
extraction of information from audio.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Transcribe 将音频录音转换为文本，这允许对客户对话进行进一步分析和提取关键信息。其他选项不直接处理音频转录或从音频中提取信息。

models.Question.question_en: Which metric measures the runtime efficiency of operating AI models?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个指标衡量操作AI模型的运行效率？
models.Question.explanation_en: Average response time measures how quickly an AI model produces an output, which reflects the runtime efficiency of the model. The other options do not directly measure the efficiency of operating AI models.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 平均响应时间衡量AI模型产生输出的速度，这反映了模型的运行效率。其他选项并不直接衡量操作AI模型的效率。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use AI to protect its application from threats. The AI solution needs to check if an IP address is from a suspicious source. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用人工智能来保护其应用程序免受威胁。该人工智能解决方案需要检查IP地址是否来自可疑来源。哪个解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: An anomaly detection system can identify suspicious behavior, such as IP addresses that deviate from expected patterns, which helps in protecting the application from threats. The other options are not designed for detecting suspicious IP addresses.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 异常检测系统可以识别可疑行为，例如偏离预期模式的IP地址，这有助于保护应用程序免受威胁。其他选项并不是为了检测可疑IP地址而设计的。

models.Question.question_en: A financial institution is using Amazon Bedrock to develop an AI application. The application is hosted in a VPC. To meet regulatory compliance standards, the VPC is not allowed access to any internet traffic. Which AWS service or feature will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家金融机构正在使用 Amazon Bedrock 开发一个 AI 应用程序。该应用程序托管在 VPC 中。为了满足监管合规标准，VPC 不允许访问任何互联网流量。哪个 AWS 服务或功能可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: AWS PrivateLink allows secure, private connectivity between VPCs and AWS services without needing internet access, making it suitable for meeting regulatory compliance standards. The other options either do not provide private connectivity or require internet access.
models.Question.explanation_cn: AWS PrivateLink 允许 VPC 和 AWS 服务之间进行安全、私密的连接，而无需互联网访问，使其适合满足监管合规标准。其他选项要么不提供私密连接，要么需要互联网访问。

models.Question.question_en:
A company wants to use generative AI to increase developer productivity and software development. The company wants to use Amazon Q Developer.

What can Amazon Q Developer do to help the company meet these requirements?

亚马逊Q开发者可以做些什么来帮助公司满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Q Developer is designed to assist developers by generating software snippets, tracking references, and managing open source licenses, which aligns with the company's goal of increasing productivity in software development. The other options do not match the intended use of Amazon Q Developer.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 亚马逊Q开发者旨在通过生成软件片段、跟踪引用和管理开源许可证来帮助开发人员，这与公司的目标一致，即提高软件开发的生产力。其他选项与亚马逊Q开发者的预期用途不符。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to build an ML model by using Amazon SageMaker. The company needs to share and manage variables for model development across multiple teams. Which SageMaker feature meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过使用 Amazon SageMaker 来构建一个机器学习模型。该公司需要在多个团队之间共享和管理模型开发的变量。哪个 SageMaker 功能满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Feature Store is a centralized repository for storing and managing features, allowing multiple teams to share and reuse variables (features) for model development. The other options serve different purposes, such as data preprocessing or model documentation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker 特征库是一个集中存储和管理特征的库，允许多个团队共享和重用变量（特征）用于模型开发。其他选项则用于不同的目的，例如数据预处理或模型文档。

models.Question.question_en: A company uses a foundation model (FM) from Amazon Bedrock for an AI search tool. The company wants to fine-tune the model to be more accurate by using the company's data. Which strategy will successfully fine-tune the model?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司使用亚马逊Bedrock的基础模型（FM）作为AI搜索工具。该公司希望通过使用公司的数据来微调模型以提高准确性。哪种策略将成功微调模型？
models.Question.explanation_en: Fine-tuning a foundation model involves training it with labeled data that contains both input prompts and corresponding expected completions to adjust the model’s behavior to fit the company’s needs. The other options are not directly related to the fine-tuning process using specific labeled data.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 微调基础模型涉及使用包含输入提示和相应预期完成的标记数据对其进行训练，以调整模型的行为以满足公司的需求。其他选项与使用特定标记数据的微调过程没有直接关系。

models.Question.question_en: A company has petabytes of unlabeled customer data to use for an advertisement campaign. The company wants to classify its customers into tiers to advertise and promote the company's products. Which methodology should the company use to meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司拥有数PB的未标记客户数据，用于广告活动。该公司希望将客户分类为不同层级，以便宣传和推广公司的产品。该公司应该使用哪种方法来满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Unsupervised learning is suitable for analyzing unlabeled data and grouping it into clusters or tiers, which aligns with the company’s goal of classifying customers. The other methods require labeled data or are used for different types of problems.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 无监督学习适合分析未标记的数据并将其分组为簇或层级，这与公司分类客户的目标一致。其他方法需要标记数据或用于不同类型的问题。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to develop an educational game where users answer questions such as the following: "A jar contains six red, four green, and three yellow marbles. What is the probability of choosing a green marble from the jar?" Which solution meets these requirements with the LEAST operational overhead?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司想要开发一个教育游戏，让用户回答类似以下问题的问题："一个罐子里有六个红色、四个绿色和三个黄色的弹珠。从罐子中选择一个绿色弹珠的概率是多少？" 哪种解决方案在满足这些要求的同时操作开销最小？
models.Question.explanation_en: Calculating probability in this scenario involves straightforward arithmetic, making it most efficient to use simple rules and computations. This approach requires the least operational overhead compared to using complex ML models, which are unnecessary for such basic tasks.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在这种情况下计算概率涉及直接的算术运算，使用简单的规则和计算是最有效的。与使用复杂的机器学习模型相比，这种方法需要的操作开销最小，对于这种基本任务来说，使用复杂的机器学习模型是不必要的。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner wants to use a foundation model (FM) to design a search application. The search application must handle queries that have text and images. Which type of FM should the AI practitioner use to power the search application?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者希望使用基础模型（FM）来设计一个搜索应用程序。该搜索应用程序必须处理包含文本和图像的查询。人工智能从业者应该使用哪种类型的FM来支持该搜索应用程序？
models.Question.explanation_en: A multi-modal embedding model can handle both text and image queries by embedding them into a shared space, enabling the search application to process and relate different data types. The other options are not suitable for handling both text and image inputs effectively.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 多模态嵌入模型可以通过将文本和图像查询嵌入到共享空间中来处理这两种类型的查询，使搜索应用程序能够处理和关联不同的数据类型。其他选项不适合有效处理文本和图像输入。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use a large language model (LLM) to develop a conversational agent. The company needs to prevent the LLM from being manipulated with common prompt engineering techniques to perform undesirable actions or expose sensitive information. Which action will reduce these risks?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLM）开发一个对话代理。该公司需要防止LLM被常见的提示工程技术操控，以执行不良行为或暴露敏感信息。哪种措施可以降低这些风险？
models.Question.explanation_en: Creating a prompt template that helps the LLM detect common attack patterns can reduce the risk of prompt injection and other undesirable manipulations. The other options do not effectively address the risk of prompt manipulation or unauthorized use.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 创建一个提示模板，帮助LLM检测常见攻击模式，可以降低提示注入和其他不良操控的风险。其他选项并未有效解决提示操控或未经授权使用的风险。

models.Question.question_en: A company has developed an ML model for image classification. The company wants to deploy the model to production so that a web application can use the model. The company needs to implement a solution to host the model and serve predictions without managing any of the underlying infrastructure. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司开发了一个用于图像分类的机器学习模型。该公司希望将模型部署到生产环境，以便Web应用程序可以使用该模型。该公司需要实施一个解决方案来托管模型并提供预测，而无需管理任何底层基础设施。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Serverless Inference allows the company to deploy the ML model without managing any underlying infrastructure, making it suitable for hosting the model and serving predictions. The other options do not directly provide serverless model deployment capabilities.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker无服务器推理允许公司在不管理任何底层基础设施的情况下部署机器学习模型，使其适合托管模型并提供预测。其他选项并不直接提供无服务器模型部署能力。

models.Question.question_en: An AI company periodically evaluates its systems and processes with the help of independent software vendors (ISVs). The company needs to receive email message notifications when an ISV's compliance reports become available. Which AWS service can the company use to meet this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家人工智能公司定期在独立软件供应商（ISV）的帮助下评估其系统和流程。该公司需要在ISV的合规报告可用时收到电子邮件通知。该公司可以使用哪个AWS服务来满足这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: AWS Artifact provides access to compliance reports, including those from independent software vendors (ISVs). The company can use AWS Artifact to receive notifications when new compliance reports are available. The other services are not used for accessing and notifying about compliance reports.
models.Question.explanation_cn: AWS Artifact提供对合规报告的访问，包括来自独立软件供应商（ISV）的报告。该公司可以使用AWS Artifact在新的合规报告可用时接收通知。其他服务不用于访问和通知合规报告。

models.Question.question_en: Which option is a use case for generative AI models?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个选项是生成性人工智能模型的使用案例？
models.Question.explanation_en: Generative AI models are used to create new content, such as photorealistic images from text descriptions, which is useful for digital marketing. The other options involve tasks better suited for analytical or detection systems rather than generative models.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 生成性人工智能模型用于创建新内容，例如从文本描述生成逼真的图像，这对数字营销非常有用。其他选项涉及的任务更适合分析或检测系统，而不是生成模型。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using the Generative AI Security Scoping Matrix to assess security responsibilities for its solutions. The company has identified four different solution scopes based on the matrix. Which solution scope gives the company the MOST ownership of security responsibilities?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用生成式人工智能安全范围矩阵来评估其解决方案的安全责任。该公司根据矩阵确定了四种不同的解决方案范围。哪种解决方案范围赋予公司对安全责任的最大所有权？
models.Question.explanation_en: Building and training a generative AI model from scratch gives the company the most ownership of security responsibilities, as it involves full control over data, training, deployment, and security measures. The other options involve varying levels of dependency on third-party tools and services, which reduces the company's ownership of security.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 从头开始构建和训练生成式人工智能模型使公司对安全责任拥有最大的所有权，因为这涉及对数据、训练、部署和安全措施的完全控制。其他选项涉及对第三方工具和服务的不同程度的依赖，这减少了公司的安全所有权。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use a large language model (LLM) on Amazon Bedrock for sentiment analysis. The company wants to classify the sentiment of text passages as positive or negative. Which prompt engineering strategy meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望在亚马逊Bedrock上使用大型语言模型（LLM）进行情感分析。该公司希望将文本段落的情感分类为积极或消极。哪种提示工程策略满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Providing examples with labels in the prompt helps the LLM understand the context of sentiment analysis, improving its accuracy in classifying the new text passage as positive or negative. The other options do not effectively guide the LLM for sentiment analysis.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在提示中提供带标签的示例有助于LLM理解情感分析的上下文，提高其将新文本段落分类为积极或消极的准确性。其他选项未能有效指导LLM进行情感分析。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to build a generative AI application by using Amazon Bedrock and needs to choose a foundation model (FM). The company wants to know how much information can fit into one prompt. Which consideration will inform the company's decision?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司想通过使用亚马逊Bedrock构建一个生成式AI应用，并需要选择一个基础模型（FM）。该公司想知道一个提示中可以容纳多少信息。哪个考虑因素将影响公司的决定？
models.Question.explanation_en: The context window determines how much information can fit into a single prompt. It specifies the number of tokens the foundation model can process at once, affecting the length of input that can be provided. The other options do not directly relate to prompt size.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 上下文窗口决定了单个提示中可以容纳多少信息。它指定了基础模型一次可以处理的令牌数量，影响可以提供的输入长度。其他选项与提示大小没有直接关系。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to make a chatbot to help customers. The chatbot will help solve technical problems without human intervention. The company chose a foundation model (FM) for the chatbot. The chatbot needs to produce responses that adhere to company tone. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司想要制作一个聊天机器人来帮助客户。这个聊天机器人将帮助解决技术问题，而无需人工干预。公司选择了一个基础模型（FM）作为聊天机器人。聊天机器人需要生成符合公司语气的回复。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Experimenting and refining the prompt allows you to guide the FM to produce responses that align with the company's desired tone. This approach helps to shape the behavior of the chatbot. The other options do not directly ensure adherence to company tone.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 实验和完善提示可以引导基础模型生成符合公司期望语气的回复。这种方法有助于塑造聊天机器人的行为。其他选项并不能直接确保遵循公司语气。

models.Question.question_en: Which feature of Amazon OpenSearch Service gives companies the ability to build vector database applications?
models.Question.question_cn: Amazon OpenSearch Service 的哪个功能使公司能够构建向量数据库应用程序？
models.Question.explanation_en: The scalable index management and nearest neighbor search capability in Amazon OpenSearch Service enables companies to build vector database applications, which are crucial for tasks like similarity search in AI models. The other options do not specifically provide the vector search functionality.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon OpenSearch Service 中的可扩展索引管理和最近邻搜索能力使公司能够构建向量数据库应用程序，这对于 AI 模型中的相似性搜索等任务至关重要。其他选项并未特别提供向量搜索功能。

models.Question.question_en: A security company is using Amazon Bedrock to run foundation models (FMs). The company wants to ensure that only authorized users invoke the models. The company needs to identify any unauthorized access attempts to set appropriate AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) policies and roles for future iterations of the FMs. Which AWS service should the company use to identify unauthorized users that are trying to access Amazon Bedrock?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家安全公司正在使用Amazon Bedrock来运行基础模型（FMs）。该公司希望确保只有授权用户调用模型。公司需要识别任何未经授权的访问尝试，以为未来的FMs迭代设置适当的AWS身份和访问管理（IAM）策略和角色。该公司应该使用哪项AWS服务来识别试图访问Amazon Bedrock的未经授权用户？
models.Question.explanation_en: AWS CloudTrail records API activity and provides a log of access attempts, which helps identify unauthorized users trying to access Amazon Bedrock. The other services are not specifically used for tracking unauthorized access attempts in this context.
models.Question.explanation_cn: AWS CloudTrail记录API活动并提供访问尝试日志，有助于识别试图访问Amazon Bedrock的未经授权用户。其他服务在这种情况下并不专门用于跟踪未经授权的访问尝试。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to create an application by using Amazon Bedrock. The company has a limited budget and prefers flexibility without long-term commitment. Which Amazon Bedrock pricing model meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过使用 Amazon Bedrock 创建一个应用程序。该公司预算有限，并且希望在没有长期承诺的情况下保持灵活性。哪种 Amazon Bedrock 定价模型符合这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: The On-Demand pricing model provides flexibility without requiring a long-term commitment, allowing the company to pay only for the resources used, which fits well with a limited budget. The other options are either not relevant to pricing flexibility or involve specific resource commitments.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 按需定价模型提供灵活性，无需长期承诺，允许公司仅为所使用的资源付费，这与有限的预算非常契合。其他选项要么与定价灵活性无关，要么涉及特定的资源承诺。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using an Amazon Titan foundation model (FM) in Amazon Bedrock. The company needs to supplement the model by using relevant data from the company's private data sources. Which solution will meet this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用亚马逊Titan基础模型（FM）在亚马逊Bedrock中。该公司需要通过使用来自公司私有数据源的相关数据来补充模型。哪种解决方案可以满足这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Creating an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base allows the company to supplement the foundation model with relevant data from their private data sources. This ensures that the model has access to the additional, context-specific information needed. The other options do not directly address supplementing the model with private data.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 创建一个亚马逊Bedrock知识库可以让公司用来自其私有数据源的相关数据来补充基础模型。这确保模型能够访问所需的额外上下文特定信息。其他选项并没有直接解决用私有数据补充模型的问题。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner is building a model to generate images of humans in various professions. The AI practitioner discovered that the input data is biased and that specific attributes affect the image generation and create bias in the model. Which technique will solve the problem?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者正在构建一个模型，以生成各种职业的人类图像。该人工智能从业者发现输入数据存在偏见，并且特定属性影响图像生成并在模型中产生偏见。哪种技术可以解决这个问题？
models.Question.explanation_en: Data augmentation for imbalanced classes helps address bias by creating a more balanced dataset, ensuring that different attributes are equally represented. This reduces bias in image generation. The other options do not directly address data bias issues.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 针对不平衡类别的数据增强通过创建更平衡的数据集来帮助解决偏见，确保不同属性得到均等代表。这减少了图像生成中的偏见。其他选项并没有直接解决数据偏见问题。

models.Question.question_en:
A company built a deep learning model for object detection and deployed the model to production.
Which AI process occurs when the model analyzes a new image to identify objects?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司构建了一个用于物体检测的深度学习模型，并将该模型部署到生产环境中。
当模型分析新图像以识别物体时，发生了哪种人工智能过程？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Inference is the process where the model analyzes new data (in this case, a new image) to make
predictions or identify objects. The other options are related to different stages of the AI lifecycle, such as
building or preparing the model.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 推理是模型分析新数据（在这种情况下是新图像）以进行预测或识别物体的过程。其他选项与人工智能生命周期的不同阶段有关，例如构建或准备模型。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to deploy a conversational chatbot to answer customer questions. The chatbot is based on a fine-tuned Amazon SageMaker JumpStart model. The application must comply with multiple regulatory frameworks. Which capabilities can the company show compliance for? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望部署一个对话式聊天机器人来回答客户问题。该聊天机器人基于经过微调的亚马逊SageMaker JumpStart模型。该应用程序必须遵守多个监管框架。公司可以展示哪些能力符合合规要求？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en: Threat detection: Ensuring security measures are in place to detect threats is important for compliance with regulatory frameworks. Data protection: Proper data handling and protection measures are key compliance aspects, especially in applications dealing with sensitive customer information. The other options (auto scaling, cost optimization, and loosely coupled microservices) are more related to performance and architecture rather than regulatory compliance.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 威胁检测：确保采取安全措施以检测威胁对于遵守监管框架至关重要。数据保护：适当的数据处理和保护措施是合规的关键方面，尤其是在处理敏感客户信息的应用程序中。其他选项（自动扩展、成本优化和松耦合微服务）更与性能和架构相关，而不是监管合规。

models.Question.question_en: Which AWS service or feature can help an AI development team quickly deploy and consume a foundation model (FM) within the team's VPC?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个AWS服务或功能可以帮助AI开发团队在团队的VPC内快速部署和使用基础模型（FM）？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker JumpStart provides pre-built models, including foundation models, that can be quickly deployed and consumed within a VPC, helping teams get started faster. The other options are not designed for deploying foundation models in this context.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker JumpStart提供了预构建的模型，包括基础模型，可以在VPC内快速部署和使用，帮助团队更快入门。其他选项并不适合在此上下文中部署基础模型。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner has a database of animal photos. The AI practitioner wants to automatically identify and categorize the animals in the photos without manual human effort. Which strategy meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者拥有一个动物照片数据库。该从业者希望在没有人工干预的情况下自动识别和分类照片中的动物。哪种策略满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Object detection is used to automatically identify and categorize objects (in this case, animals) in photos. It can detect the presence of animals and classify them accordingly. The other strategies are not suitable for identifying and categorizing animals in images.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 目标检测用于自动识别和分类照片中的物体（在这种情况下是动物）。它可以检测动物的存在并相应地进行分类。其他策略不适合识别和分类图像中的动物。

models.Question.question_en: A medical company is customizing a foundation model (FM) for diagnostic purposes. The company needs the model to be transparent and explainable to meet regulatory requirements. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家医疗公司正在定制一个基础模型（FM）用于诊断目的。该公司需要模型具有透明性和可解释性，以满足监管要求。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Clarify helps with transparency and explainability by generating metrics, reports, and examples that show how the model makes decisions, which is essential for meeting regulatory requirements. The other options are not directly related to improving the model's transparency or explainability.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker Clarify通过生成指标、报告和示例来帮助实现透明性和可解释性，这些内容展示了模型如何做出决策，这对于满足监管要求至关重要。其他选项与提高模型的透明性或可解释性没有直接关系。

models.Question.question_en: A company has terabytes of data in a database that the company can use for business analysis. The company wants to build an AI-based application that can build a SQL query from input text that employees provide. The employees have minimal experience with technology. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司在数据库中拥有几千兆字节的数据，可以用于业务分析。该公司希望构建一个基于人工智能的应用程序，可以从员工提供的输入文本中构建SQL查询。员工对技术几乎没有经验。哪种解决方案符合这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: GPT models are well-suited for converting natural language input into structured queries like SQL, making them ideal for building an AI-based application that translates employee-provided text into SQL queries. The other options are not designed for natural language understanding and query generation tasks.
models.Question.explanation_cn: GPT模型非常适合将自然语言输入转换为结构化查询，比如SQL，使其成为构建基于人工智能的应用程序的理想选择，可以将员工提供的文本转换为SQL查询。其他选项并非设计用于自然语言理解和查询生成任务。

models.Question.question_en: How can companies use large language models (LLMs) securely on Amazon Bedrock?
models.Question.question_cn: 公司如何可以在亚马逊Bedrock上安全地使用大型语言模型（LLMs）？
models.Question.explanation_en: Designing clear prompts and using IAM roles with least privilege access ensures secure use of LLMs on Amazon Bedrock by minimizing access risks and preventing misuse. The other options do not directly address securing the use of LLMs.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 设计清晰的提示并使用具有最小特权访问权限的IAM角色，可以通过最小化访问风险和防止滥用来确保在亚马逊Bedrock上安全使用LLMs。其他选项并未直接解决保护LLMs使用的问题。

models.Question.question_en: A social media company wants to use a large language model (LLM) for content moderation. The company wants to evaluate the LLM outputs for bias and potential discrimination against specific groups or individuals. Which data source should the company use to evaluate the LLM outputs with the LEAST administrative effort?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家社交媒体公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLM）进行内容审核。该公司希望评估LLM输出的偏见和对特定群体或个人的潜在歧视。该公司应该使用哪个数据源来以最少的行政工作评估LLM输出？
models.Question.explanation_en: Benchmark datasets are standardized datasets specifically designed for evaluating models for bias and fairness, allowing for efficient assessment with minimal administrative effort. The other options would require more manual processing and might not provide a consistent basis for evaluating bias and discrimination.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 基准数据集是专门设计用于评估模型的偏见和公平性的标准化数据集，允许以最小的行政工作进行高效评估。其他选项将需要更多的手动处理，并可能无法提供一致的评估偏见和歧视的基础。

models.Question.question_en: An ecommerce company wants to build a solution to determine customer sentiments based on written customer reviews of products. Which AWS services meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家电子商务公司希望构建一个解决方案，以根据客户对产品的书面评论来确定客户情感。哪些AWS服务满足这些要求？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Comprehend: This service is specifically designed for natural language processing (NLP) tasks, including sentiment analysis, making it ideal for analyzing customer reviews. Amazon Bedrock: Bedrock can be used to leverage foundation models, which can also be employed for sentiment analysis tasks. The other options are not suitable for sentiment analysis of written customer reviews.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Comprehend：该服务专门设计用于自然语言处理（NLP）任务，包括情感分析，非常适合分析客户评论。Amazon Bedrock：Bedrock可用于利用基础模型，这些模型也可以用于情感分析任务。其他选项不适合对书面客户评论进行情感分析。

models.Question.question_en: A company is developing a new model to predict the prices of specific items. The model performed well on the training dataset. When the company deployed the model to production, the model's performance decreased significantly. What should the company do to mitigate this problem?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在开发一个新模型来预测特定商品的价格。该模型在训练数据集上表现良好。当公司将模型部署到生产环境时，模型的性能显著下降。公司应该采取什么措施来缓解这个问题？
models.Question.explanation_en: Increasing the volume of data used in training helps the model generalize better to new, unseen data, reducing overfitting and improving performance in production. The other options either do not address the issue of model generalization or are unlikely to effectively solve the problem.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 增加训练中使用的数据量有助于模型更好地泛化到新的、未见过的数据，从而减少过拟合并提高生产中的性能。其他选项要么没有解决模型泛化的问题，要么不太可能有效地解决该问题。

models.Question.question_en: A company is training a foundation model (FM). The company wants to increase the accuracy of the model up to a specific acceptance level. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在训练一个基础模型（FM）。该公司希望将模型的准确性提高到特定的接受水平。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Increasing the number of epochs allows the model to train for more iterations, improving its accuracy until the model reaches an optimal level. The other options are either less effective or unrelated to improving accuracy.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 增加训练轮数允许模型进行更多的迭代，从而提高其准确性，直到模型达到最佳水平。其他选项要么效果较差，要么与提高准确性无关。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use a pre-trained generative AI model to generate content for its marketing campaigns. The company needs to ensure that the generated content aligns with the company's brand voice and messaging requirements. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用预训练的生成式人工智能模型为其营销活动生成内容。该公司需要确保生成的内容与公司的品牌声音和信息要求一致。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Creating effective prompts helps guide the pre-trained generative AI model to produce content that aligns with the company's brand voice and messaging. The other options either involve model architecture changes or require extensive training, which are not necessary for aligning content generation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 创建有效的提示有助于指导预训练的生成式人工智能模型生成与公司品牌声音和信息一致的内容。其他选项要么涉及模型架构的更改，要么需要大量的训练，这对于对齐内容生成并不是必要的。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use large language models (LLMs) with Amazon Bedrock to develop a chat interface for the company's product manuals. The manuals are stored as PDF files. Which solution meets these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLMs）与亚马逊Bedrock开发一个聊天界面，用于公司的产品手册。这些手册存储为PDF文件。哪种解决方案最具成本效益地满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Using an Amazon Bedrock knowledge base allows the model to efficiently access relevant information from the PDF manuals when needed, reducing the cost compared to continuously fine-tuning a model or providing all PDFs as context in each prompt. This approach ensures that only necessary context is provided, making it cost-effective.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 使用亚马逊Bedrock知识库可以让模型在需要时有效地访问PDF手册中的相关信息，相比于不断微调模型或在每个提示中提供所有PDF作为上下文，这样可以降低成本。这种方法确保只提供必要的上下文，从而使其具有成本效益。

models.Question.question_en:
A company is using an Amazon Bedrock base model to summarize documents for an internal use case.
The company trained a custom model to improve the summarization quality.

Which action must the company take to use the custom model through Amazon Bedrock?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司正在使用 Amazon Bedrock 基础模型为内部用例总结文档。
该公司训练了一个自定义模型以提高摘要质量。

该公司必须采取什么措施才能通过 Amazon Bedrock 使用自定义模型？

models.Question.question_en: Which functionality does Amazon SageMaker Clarify provide?
models.Question.question_cn: 亚马逊 SageMaker Clarify 提供了什么功能？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Clarify helps detect potential bias in datasets and models during data preparation, training, and deployment. It also provides tools for explainability. The other options are functionalities that do not directly match SageMaker Clarify's core features.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 亚马逊 SageMaker Clarify 在数据准备、训练和部署过程中帮助检测数据集和模型中的潜在偏见。它还提供可解释性的工具。其他选项是与 SageMaker Clarify 的核心功能不直接匹配的功能。

models.Question.question_en: A loan company is building a generative AI-based solution to offer new applicants discounts based on specific business criteria. The company wants to build and use an AI model responsibly to minimize bias that could negatively affect some customers. Which actions should the company take to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家贷款公司正在构建一个基于生成式人工智能的解决方案，根据特定的业务标准为新申请人提供折扣。该公司希望负责地构建和使用人工智能模型，以最小化可能对某些客户产生负面影响的偏见。公司应采取哪些行动来满足这些要求？（选择两项）
models.Question.explanation_en: Detect imbalances or disparities in the data: Identifying and addressing data imbalances helps minimize biases that could negatively affect customers. Evaluate the model's behavior so that the company can provide transparency to stakeholders: Evaluating the model and ensuring transparency is important for responsible AI usage, as it helps stakeholders understand how decisions are made. The other options are either not directly related to minimizing bias or do not address responsible AI development.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 检测数据中的不平衡或差异：识别和解决数据不平衡有助于最小化可能对客户产生负面影响的偏见。评估模型的行为，以便公司向利益相关者提供透明度：评估模型并确保透明度对于负责任地使用人工智能非常重要，因为它帮助利益相关者了解决策是如何做出的。其他选项要么与最小化偏见无直接关联，要么未涉及负责任的人工智能开发。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building a large language model (LLM) question answering chatbot. The company wants to decrease the number of actions call center employees need to take to respond to customer questions. Which business objective should the company use to evaluate the effect of the LLM chatbot?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在构建一个大型语言模型（LLM）问答聊天机器人。该公司希望减少呼叫中心员工在回应客户问题时需要采取的行动数量。该公司应该使用哪个业务目标来评估LLM聊天机器人的效果？
models.Question.explanation_en: Reducing the average call duration directly indicates how effectively the LLM chatbot is helping call center employees answer customer questions, thus reducing the number of actions needed. The other options are not directly related to the performance of a call center chatbot.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 减少平均通话时长直接表明LLM聊天机器人在多大程度上帮助呼叫中心员工回答客户问题，从而减少所需的行动数量。其他选项与呼叫中心聊天机器人的性能没有直接关系。

models.Question.question_en:
A company is building an application that needs to generate synthetic data that is based on existing data.
Which type of model can the company use to meet this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司正在构建一个需要生成基于现有数据的合成数据的应用程序。
该公司可以使用哪种类型的模型来满足这一要求？

models.Question.question_en:
A student at a university is copying content from generative AI to write essays.
Which challenge of responsible generative AI does this scenario represent?
models.Question.question_cn:
一名大学生正在从生成性人工智能中复制内容来写论文。
这个场景代表了负责任的生成性人工智能面临的哪个挑战？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Copying content from generative AI to write essays without proper attribution constitutes plagiarism, which
is a key challenge of responsible generative AI. The other options are unrelated to this specific issue.
models.Question.explanation_cn:
在没有适当引用的情况下，从生成性人工智能中复制内容来写论文构成了抄袭，这
是负责任的生成性人工智能面临的一个关键挑战。其他选项与这个具体问题无关。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to build an interactive application for children that generates new stories based on classic stories. The company wants to use Amazon Bedrock and needs to ensure that the results and topics are appropriate for children. Which AWS service or feature will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司想为儿童构建一个互动应用程序，该程序基于经典故事生成新故事。该公司希望使用 Amazon Bedrock，并需要确保结果和主题适合儿童。哪个 AWS 服务或功能可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Guardrails for Amazon Bedrock can help ensure that the output generated by Amazon Bedrock is appropriate for children. Guardrails are used to apply content moderation, guidelines, and ensure safety by filtering potentially harmful or inappropriate content, which is essential when building an interactive application for children.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock 的保护措施可以帮助确保 Amazon Bedrock 生成的输出适合儿童。保护措施用于应用内容审核、指导方针，并通过过滤潜在有害或不当内容来确保安全，这在构建儿童互动应用程序时至关重要。

models.Question.question_en:
A company needs to build its own large language model (LLM) based on only the company's private data.
The company is concerned about the environmental effect of the training process.
Which Amazon EC2 instance type has the LEAST environmental effect when training LLMs?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司需要基于公司的私有数据构建自己的大型语言模型（LLM）。
该公司担心训练过程对环境的影响。
哪种亚马逊EC2实例类型在训练LLM时对环境的影响最小？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon EC2 Trn series instances (powered by AWS Trainium chips) are designed to provide efficient and environmentally friendly training of large machine learning models. They are optimized for energy efficiency, which reduces the environmental impact of the training process. The other instance types are not specifically optimized for minimizing environmental effects during training.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 亚马逊EC2 Trn系列实例（由AWS Trainium芯片提供支持）旨在提供高效且环保的大型机器学习模型训练。它们经过优化以提高能效，从而减少训练过程对环境的影响。其他实例类型并未特别优化以最小化训练过程中的环境影响。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building a customer service chatbot. The company wants the chatbot to improve its responses by learning from past interactions and online resources. Which AI learning strategy provides this self-improvement capability?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在构建一个客户服务聊天机器人。该公司希望聊天机器人通过学习过去的互动和在线资源来改善其响应。哪种人工智能学习策略提供了这种自我改进的能力？
models.Question.explanation_en: Reinforcement learning allows the chatbot to learn from interactions by receiving rewards for positive customer feedback, which helps the model self-improve over time. The other options do not directly provide a mechanism for continuous self-improvement based on interactions.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 强化学习允许聊天机器人通过获得积极客户反馈的奖励来从互动中学习，这有助于模型随着时间的推移自我改进。其他选项并没有直接提供基于互动的持续自我改进机制。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner has built a deep learning model to classify the types of materials in images. The AI practitioner now wants to measure the model performance. Which metric will help the AI practitioner evaluate the performance of the model?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者构建了一个深度学习模型，用于分类图像中的材料类型。该人工智能从业者现在想要衡量模型的性能。哪种指标将帮助人工智能从业者评估模型的性能？
models.Question.explanation_en: A confusion matrix provides detailed insights into the performance of a classification model by showing the true positives, false positives, true negatives, and false negatives. This metric helps evaluate how well the model classifies the different types of materials in images. The other metrics are not as suitable for evaluating a classification model.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 混淆矩阵通过显示真正例、假正例、真负例和假负例，提供了对分类模型性能的详细洞察。该指标有助于评估模型如何分类图像中的不同材料类型。其他指标不太适合评估分类模型。

models.Question.question_en: A digital devices company wants to predict customer demand for memory hardware. The company does not have coding experience or knowledge of ML algorithms and needs to develop a data-driven predictive model. The company needs to perform analysis on internal data and external data. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家数字设备公司希望预测客户对内存硬件的需求。该公司没有编码经验或机器学习算法的知识，需要开发一个数据驱动的预测模型。该公司需要对内部数据和外部数据进行分析。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Canvas is a no-code tool that allows users to build ML models and make predictions without requiring programming knowledge. It is ideal for users with no coding experience, providing an easy interface for importing data and generating predictive models. The other options require more technical expertise or are not designed for no-code model building.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker Canvas 是一个无代码工具，允许用户构建机器学习模型并进行预测，而无需编程知识。它非常适合没有编码经验的用户，提供了一个简单的界面来导入数据并生成预测模型。其他选项需要更多的技术专长，或者不适合无代码模型构建。

models.Question.question_en: A company has built a chatbot that can respond to natural language questions with images. The company wants to ensure that the chatbot does not return inappropriate or unwanted images. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司已经建立了一个能够用图片回答自然语言问题的聊天机器人。该公司希望确保聊天机器人不会返回不当或不需要的图片。哪种解决方案能够满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Implementing moderation APIs can help filter and block inappropriate or unwanted images before they are returned by the chatbot. The other options do not directly address ensuring that the chatbot avoids returning inappropriate images.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 实施审查 API 可以帮助过滤和阻止不当或不需要的图片在被聊天机器人返回之前。其他选项并没有直接解决确保聊天机器人避免返回不当图片的问题。

models.Question.question_en: A company has installed a security camera. The company uses an ML model to evaluate the security camera footage for potential thefts. The company has discovered that the model disproportionately flags people who are members of a specific ethnic group. Which type of bias is affecting the model output?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司安装了监控摄像头。该公司使用机器学习模型来评估监控录像以查找潜在的盗窃行为。该公司发现，该模型不成比例地标记了属于特定族群的人员。哪种偏见影响了模型的输出？
models.Question.explanation_en: Sampling bias occurs when the training data is not representative of the overall population, leading to disproportionate flagging of specific groups. In this case, the model may have been trained on biased data that did not adequately represent all ethnic groups, resulting in skewed predictions. The other types of bias do not directly apply to the selection of training data or its representativeness.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 抽样偏差发生在训练数据未能代表整体人群时，导致特定群体被不成比例地标记。在这种情况下，模型可能是在偏见数据上训练的，这些数据未能充分代表所有族群，导致预测偏差。其他类型的偏见并不直接适用于训练数据的选择或其代表性。

models.Question.question_en: A company needs to choose a model from Amazon Bedrock to use internally. The company must identify a model that generates responses in a style that the company's employees prefer. What should the company do to meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司需要选择一个来自Amazon Bedrock的模型以供内部使用。该公司必须识别一个能够生成符合员工偏好的风格的响应的模型。公司应该怎么做以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Evaluating models using a human workforce and custom prompt datasets ensures that the model generates responses in the style that aligns with the company’s preferences. The other options either do not provide direct feedback on style preferences or are not specific enough for determining suitability based on employee preferences.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 使用人力和自定义提示数据集评估模型可以确保模型生成符合公司偏好的风格的响应。其他选项要么无法直接反馈风格偏好，要么不够具体，无法根据员工偏好确定适用性。

models.Question.question_en: Which strategy evaluates the accuracy of a foundation model (FM) that is used in image classification tasks?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪种策略评估用于图像分类任务的基础模型（FM）的准确性？
models.Question.explanation_en: Evaluating a foundation model's accuracy by measuring its performance against a predefined benchmark dataset is the standard approach for assessing accuracy in image classification tasks. The other options do not provide an appropriate measure of classification accuracy.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 通过将基础模型的性能与预定义基准数据集进行比较来评估其准确性，是评估图像分类任务中准确性的标准方法。其他选项未能提供适当的分类准确性衡量标准。

models.Question.question_en: A company manually reviews all submitted resumes in PDF format. As the company grows, the company expects the volume of resumes to exceed the company's review capacity. The company needs an automated system to convert the PDF resumes into plain text format for additional processing. Which AWS service meets this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司手动审核所有提交的PDF格式简历。随着公司的发展，公司预计简历的数量将超过公司的审核能力。公司需要一个自动化系统将PDF简历转换为纯文本格式以便进一步处理。哪项AWS服务满足这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Textract can extract text from PDF documents, making it suitable for converting resumes into plain text for further processing. The other services do not provide functionality to extract text from PDFs.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Textract可以从PDF文档中提取文本，使其适合将简历转换为纯文本以便进一步处理。其他服务不提供从PDF中提取文本的功能。

models.Question.question_en: Which term describes the numerical representations of real-world objects and concepts that AI and natural language processing (NLP) models use to improve understanding of textual information?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个术语描述了人工智能和自然语言处理（NLP）模型用来提高对文本信息理解的现实世界对象和概念的数值表示？
models.Question.explanation_en: Embeddings are numerical representations of real-world objects and concepts that help AI and NLP models understand and work with textual information more effectively by capturing relationships and similarities between words or phrases. The other options do not describe this concept.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 嵌入是现实世界对象和概念的数值表示，它帮助人工智能和自然语言处理模型更有效地理解和处理文本信息，通过捕捉单词或短语之间的关系和相似性。其他选项并不描述这一概念。

models.Question.question_en: A research company implemented a chatbot by using a foundation model (FM) from Amazon Bedrock. The chatbot searches for answers to questions from a large database of research papers. After multiple prompt engineering attempts, the company notices that the FM is performing poorly because of the complex scientific terms in the research papers. How can the company improve the performance of the chatbot?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家研究公司通过使用亚马逊Bedrock的基础模型（FM）实现了一个聊天机器人。该聊天机器人从一个大型研究论文数据库中搜索问题的答案。在多次提示工程尝试后，公司注意到由于研究论文中的复杂科学术语，FM的表现不佳。公司如何提高聊天机器人的性能？
models.Question.explanation_en: Domain adaptation fine-tuning allows the FM to better understand the complex scientific terms by training it with domain-specific data, improving its performance on such specialized content. The other options are either insufficient or not directly related to handling complex terminology effectively.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 领域适应微调使FM能够通过使用特定领域的数据进行训练，更好地理解复杂的科学术语，从而提高其在此类专业内容上的表现。其他选项要么不够充分，要么与有效处理复杂术语没有直接关系。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner is using an Amazon Bedrock base model to summarize session chats from the customer service department. The AI practitioner wants to store invocation logs to monitor model input and output data. Which strategy should the AI practitioner use?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者正在使用亚马逊Bedrock基础模型来总结客户服务部门的会话聊天记录。这位人工智能从业者希望存储调用日志以监控模型的输入和输出数据。该从业者应该使用哪种策略？
models.Question.explanation_en: Enabling invocation logging in Amazon Bedrock allows the AI practitioner to monitor and store the input and output data for model invocations. The other options are not directly used for logging model invocations in Amazon Bedrock.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在亚马逊Bedrock中启用调用日志记录允许人工智能从业者监控和存储模型调用的输入和输出数据。其他选项并不是直接用于在亚马逊Bedrock中记录模型调用。

models.Question.question_en: A medical company deployed a disease detection model on Amazon Bedrock. To comply with privacy policies, the company wants to prevent the model from including personal patient information in its responses. The company also wants to receive notification when policy violations occur. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家医疗公司在亚马逊Bedrock上部署了一个疾病检测模型。为了遵守隐私政策，该公司希望防止模型在其响应中包含个人患者信息。该公司还希望在发生政策违规时收到通知。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Guardrails for Amazon Bedrock can be used to filter content and ensure that personal patient information is not included in model responses. Setting up Amazon CloudWatch alarms allows the company to receive notifications when policy violations occur. The other options are not specifically designed for filtering model output and monitoring policy compliance.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 亚马逊Bedrock的保护措施可用于过滤内容，确保模型响应中不包含个人患者信息。设置亚马逊CloudWatch警报可以让公司在发生政策违规时收到通知。其他选项并不是专门设计用于过滤模型输出和监控政策合规性的。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building an ML model to analyze archived data. The company must perform inference on large datasets that are multiple GBs in size. The company does not need to access the model predictions immediately. Which Amazon SageMaker inference option will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在构建一个机器学习模型来分析存档数据。该公司必须对多个GB大小的大型数据集执行推断。该公司不需要立即访问模型预测结果。哪种Amazon SageMaker推断选项将满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Batch transform is ideal for processing large datasets that do not require real-time predictions. It allows the company to perform inference on multiple GBs of data efficiently without needing immediate results. The other options are more suitable for scenarios requiring real-time or near real-time access.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 批量转换适用于处理不需要实时预测的大型数据集。它允许公司高效地对多个GB的数据执行推断，而无需立即结果。其他选项更适合需要实时或几乎实时访问的情况。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use a large language model (LLM) on Amazon Bedrock for sentiment analysis. The company needs the LLM to produce more consistent responses to the same input prompt. Which adjustment to an inference parameter should the company make to meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望在亚马逊Bedrock上使用大型语言模型（LLM）进行情感分析。该公司需要LLM对相同的输入提示产生更一致的响应。公司应该对推理参数进行什么调整以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Decreasing the temperature value makes the model's output more deterministic and consistent by reducing randomness in response generation. The other adjustments do not directly ensure consistent responses.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 降低温度值使模型的输出更加确定和一致，通过减少响应生成中的随机性。其他调整并不能直接确保一致的响应。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to develop a large language model (LLM) application by using Amazon Bedrock and customer data that is uploaded to Amazon S3. The company's security policy states that each team can access data for only the team's own customers. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过使用Amazon Bedrock和上传到Amazon S3的客户数据来开发大型语言模型（LLM）应用程序。公司的安全政策规定，每个团队只能访问自己客户的数据。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Creating a custom Amazon Bedrock service role for each team with restricted access to only the team's customer data ensures compliance with the security policy, providing the necessary data segregation and access control. The other options do not effectively enforce team-specific access or may pose risks of broader access than allowed by the policy.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为每个团队创建一个自定义的Amazon Bedrock服务角色，仅限于访问该团队的客户数据，确保遵守安全政策，提供必要的数据隔离和访问控制。其他选项未能有效执行团队特定的访问控制，或可能导致超出政策允许的更广泛访问的风险。

models.Question.question_en: An education provider is building a question and answer application that uses a generative AI model to explain complex concepts. The education provider wants to automatically change the style of the model response depending on who is asking the question. The education provider will give the model the age range of the user who has asked the question. Which solution meets these requirements with the LEAST implementation effort?
models.Question.question_cn: 一个教育提供者正在构建一个问题和答案应用程序，该应用程序使用生成式AI模型来解释复杂概念。教育提供者希望根据提问者的身份自动更改模型响应的风格。教育提供者将向模型提供提问问题的用户的年龄范围。哪种解决方案在实施方面的工作量最小？
models.Question.explanation_en: Adding a role description to the prompt is the simplest and most effective way to adjust the model's response style based on the user's age range. It requires minimal implementation effort and effectively tailors the output. The other options involve more complex processes, such as fine-tuning or additional reasoning steps.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 向提示中添加角色描述是根据用户年龄范围调整模型响应风格的最简单和最有效的方法。它需要最少的实施工作量，并有效地定制输出。其他选项涉及更复杂的过程，如微调或额外的推理步骤。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner is using a large language model (LLM) to create content for marketing campaigns. The generated content sounds plausible and factual but is incorrect. Which problem is the LLM having?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者正在使用大型语言模型（LLM）为营销活动创建内容。生成的内容听起来似乎合理且真实，但实际上是错误的。LLM遇到了什么问题？
models.Question.explanation_en: Hallucination occurs when a large language model generates content that appears plausible and factual but is incorrect or fabricated. This is a common issue with LLMs. The other options do not describe this particular behavior.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 幻觉是指大型语言模型生成的内容看起来合理且真实，但实际上是错误或虚构的。这是LLM常见的问题。其他选项并未描述这种特定行为。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building a chatbot to improve user experience. The company is using a large language model (LLM) from Amazon Bedrock for intent detection. The company wants to use few-shot learning to improve intent detection accuracy. Which additional data does the company need to meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在构建一个聊天机器人以改善用户体验。该公司正在使用来自亚马逊Bedrock的大型语言模型（LLM）进行意图检测。该公司希望使用少量示例学习来提高意图检测的准确性。为了满足这些要求，该公司还需要哪些额外数据？
models.Question.explanation_en: Few-shot learning involves providing the model with a few examples to help it understand how to perform the task. For intent detection, the company needs pairs of user messages and the correct user intents, which will help the LLM improve its accuracy in detecting user intents. The other options do not provide the necessary pairing for improving intent detection.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 少量示例学习涉及向模型提供一些示例，以帮助其理解如何执行任务。对于意图检测，该公司需要用户消息和正确用户意图的配对，这将帮助LLM提高其检测用户意图的准确性。其他选项未提供改善意图检测所需的配对。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building an ML model. The company collected new data and analyzed the data by creating a correlation matrix, calculating statistics, and visualizing the data. Which stage of the ML pipeline is the company currently in?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在构建一个机器学习模型。该公司收集了新数据，并通过创建相关矩阵、计算统计数据和可视化数据来分析这些数据。该公司目前处于机器学习管道的哪个阶段？
models.Question.explanation_en: The company is currently in the exploratory data analysis (EDA) stage, which involves summarizing data through statistics, visualizations, and correlation matrices to understand the dataset before moving on to modeling. The other options are subsequent steps in the ML pipeline.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 该公司目前处于探索性数据分析（EDA）阶段，该阶段涉及通过统计、可视化和相关矩阵来总结数据，以理解数据集，然后再进行建模。其他选项是机器学习管道中的后续步骤。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using few-shot prompting on a base model that is hosted on Amazon Bedrock. The model currently uses 10 examples in the prompt. The model is invoked once daily and is performing well. The company wants to lower the monthly cost. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用少量示例提示在亚马逊Bedrock上托管的基础模型。该模型目前在提示中使用10个示例。该模型每天调用一次，表现良好。公司希望降低每月成本。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Decreasing the number of tokens in the prompt reduces the amount of data being processed, thereby lowering the cost of using the model. Since the model is performing well, reducing the prompt size is a cost-effective way to maintain performance while lowering expenses. The other options either increase costs or are unrelated to prompt size.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 减少提示中的令牌数量会减少处理的数据量，从而降低使用模型的成本。由于模型表现良好，减少提示大小是一种在降低开支的同时保持性能的成本有效的方法。其他选项要么增加成本，要么与提示大小无关。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner trained a custom model on Amazon Bedrock by using a training dataset that contains confidential data. The AI practitioner wants to ensure that the custom model does not generate inference responses based on confidential data. How should the AI practitioner prevent responses based on confidential data?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者在亚马逊Bedrock上使用包含机密数据的训练数据集训练了一个自定义模型。该人工智能从业者希望确保自定义模型不会基于机密数据生成推理响应。该人工智能从业者应该如何防止基于机密数据的响应？
models.Question.explanation_en: To ensure that the custom model does not generate responses based on confidential data, the best approach is to retrain the model without including the confidential data. This prevents the model from learning patterns associated with that sensitive information, thereby avoiding its use in inference. The other options do not address the root cause of the issue—removing confidential data from the training process.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为了确保自定义模型不会基于机密数据生成响应，最佳方法是重新训练模型，而不包括机密数据。这可以防止模型学习与该敏感信息相关的模式，从而避免在推理中使用它。其他选项并没有解决问题的根本原因——在训练过程中移除机密数据。

models.Question.question_en:
An accounting firm wants to implement a large language model (LLM) to automate document processing.
The firm must proceed responsibly to avoid potential harms.
What should the firm do when developing and deploying the LLM? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn:
一家会计事务所希望实施大型语言模型（LLM）来自动化文档处理。
该事务所必须负责任地进行，以避免潜在的危害。
在开发和部署LLM时，该事务所应该做什么？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en:
Include fairness metrics for model evaluation: Fairness metrics help ensure that the LLM is unbiased
and treats all cases equitably, which is essential for responsible AI use.
Modify the training data to mitigate bias: Adjusting the training data helps reduce any inherent bias that
might exist, contributing to a more fair and responsible LLM.
The other options are related to general model optimization but do not directly address responsible AI
practices regarding potential harms like bias and fairness.
models.Question.explanation_cn:
包括模型评估的公平性指标：公平性指标有助于确保LLM不带偏见，
并公平对待所有案例，这对负责任的人工智能使用至关重要。
修改训练数据以减轻偏见：调整训练数据有助于减少可能存在的固有偏见，
从而促进更公平和负责任的LLM。
其他选项与一般模型优化相关，但并未直接解决与偏见和公平性相关的潜在危害的负责任的人工智能实践。

models.Question.question_en: A company has built a solution by using generative AI. The solution uses large language models (LLMs) to translate training manuals from English into other languages. The company wants to evaluate the accuracy of the solution by examining the text generated for the manuals. Which model evaluation strategy meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司通过使用生成性人工智能构建了解决方案。该解决方案使用大型语言模型（LLMs）将培训手册从英语翻译成其他语言。公司希望通过检查为手册生成的文本来评估解决方案的准确性。哪种模型评估策略符合这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: The BLEU (Bilingual Evaluation Understudy) score is a common metric used to evaluate the accuracy of machine translation by comparing the generated translation with reference translations. It is specifically designed for translation tasks, whereas the other metrics are not suitable for evaluating translation quality.
models.Question.explanation_cn: BLEU（双语评估替代）分数是一种常用的指标，用于通过将生成的翻译与参考翻译进行比较来评估机器翻译的准确性。它专门为翻译任务设计，而其他指标不适合评估翻译质量。

models.Question.question_en:
A company has documents that are missing some words because of a database error. The company wants to build an ML model that can suggest potential words to fill in the missing text.

Which type of model meets this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司的文件由于数据库错误缺少一些单词。该公司希望构建一个机器学习模型，可以建议填补缺失文本的潜在单词。

哪种类型的模型符合这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: BERT-based models are well-suited for natural language understanding tasks, including filling in missing words, because they use contextual information to predict missing tokens in a text. The other types of models are not designed for this type of text completion task.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 基于BERT的模型非常适合自然语言理解任务，包括填补缺失的单词，因为它们使用上下文信息来预测文本中缺失的标记。其他类型的模型并不适用于这种类型的文本完成任务。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to display the total sales for its top-selling products across various retail locations in the past 12 months. Which AWS solution should the company use to automate the generation of graphs?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望显示过去12个月各零售地点畅销产品的总销售额。该公司应该使用哪种AWS解决方案来自动生成图表？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Q in Amazon QuickSight allows users to ask questions in natural language and automatically generate graphs and visualizations to display insights, such as total sales for top-selling products. The other options do not provide the same functionality for generating visual analytics.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon QuickSight中的Amazon Q允许用户用自然语言提问，并自动生成图表和可视化内容以展示洞察，例如畅销产品的总销售额。其他选项不提供相同的功能来生成可视化分析。

models.Question.question_en: A large retailer receives thousands of customer support inquiries about products every day. The customer support inquiries need to be processed quickly. The company wants to implement Agents for Amazon Bedrock. What are the key benefits of using Amazon Bedrock agents that could help this retailer?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家大型零售商每天收到成千上万的关于产品的客户支持咨询。客户支持咨询需要快速处理。公司希望实施Amazon Bedrock的代理。使用Amazon Bedrock代理的关键好处是什么，可以帮助这家零售商？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock agents help automate repetitive tasks and orchestrate complex workflows, which is ideal for handling thousands of customer support inquiries efficiently. This helps reduce response times and improves productivity. The other options do not directly address automation and orchestration of tasks for customer support.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock代理帮助自动化重复任务并编排复杂工作流程，这对于高效处理成千上万的客户支持咨询非常理想。这有助于减少响应时间并提高生产力。其他选项并未直接涉及客户支持任务的自动化和编排。

models.Question.question_en: Which option is a benefit of ongoing pre-training when fine-tuning a foundation model (FM)?
models.Question.question_cn: 在微调基础模型（FM）时，持续预训练的好处是什么？
models.Question.explanation_en: Ongoing pre-training helps enhance a foundation model's performance by continuously updating it with new data, thereby improving its ability to generalize and perform well on different tasks. The other options do not directly relate to the benefits of ongoing pre-training.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 持续预训练通过不断用新数据更新基础模型，帮助提升其性能，从而改善其在不同任务上的泛化能力和表现。其他选项与持续预训练的好处没有直接关系。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to assess the costs that are associated with using a large language model (LLM) to generate inferences. The company wants to use Amazon Bedrock to build generative AI applications. Which factor will drive the inference costs?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望评估与使用大型语言模型（LLM）生成推断相关的成本。该公司希望使用亚马逊Bedrock构建生成式AI应用程序。哪个因素将推动推断成本？
models.Question.explanation_en: Inference costs for large language models are typically driven by the number of tokens processed during input and output, as each token incurs computational resources. The other factors (temperature value, training data, and training time) do not directly impact inference costs.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 大型语言模型的推断成本通常由输入和输出过程中处理的令牌数量驱动，因为每个令牌都会消耗计算资源。其他因素（温度值、训练数据和训练时间）不会直接影响推断成本。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use Amazon Bedrock. The company needs to review which security aspects the company is responsible for when using Amazon Bedrock. Which security aspect will the company be responsible for?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司想要使用 Amazon Bedrock。该公司需要审查在使用 Amazon Bedrock 时，自己负责哪些安全方面。该公司将负责哪个安全方面？
models.Question.explanation_en:
According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, AWS manages the security of the cloud, including the infrastructure and services like Amazon Bedrock. Customers are responsible for security in the cloud, which encompasses protecting their data, managing access controls, and configuring security settings for their applications.

Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/shared-responsibility-model/?nc1=h_ls
models.Question.explanation_cn:
根据 AWS 共享责任模型，AWS 管理云的安全性，包括基础设施和像 Amazon Bedrock 这样的服务。客户负责云中的安全性，这包括保护他们的数据、管理访问控制以及为他们的应用程序配置安全设置。

参考文献：https://aws.amazon.com/compliance/shared-responsibility-model/?nc1=h_ls

models.Question.question_en: A company has a foundation model (FM) that was customized by using Amazon Bedrock to answer customer queries about products. The company wants to validate the model's responses to new types of queries. The company needs to upload a new dataset that Amazon Bedrock can use for validation. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司有一个基础模型（FM），通过使用 Amazon Bedrock 定制，以回答客户关于产品的查询。该公司希望验证模型对新类型查询的响应。该公司需要上传一个新的数据集，以便 Amazon Bedrock 可以用于验证。哪个 AWS 服务满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon S3 is the most suitable AWS service for uploading and storing datasets used for validation purposes. It is highly scalable and integrated with Amazon Bedrock, allowing easy access to data for model validation. The other options do not provide the same level of integration or suitability for managing datasets in this context.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon S3 是上传和存储用于验证目的的数据集的最合适的 AWS 服务。它具有高度可扩展性，并与 Amazon Bedrock 集成，允许轻松访问用于模型验证的数据。其他选项在此上下文中不提供相同级别的集成或适用性。

models.Question.question_en: Which prompting attack directly exposes the configured behavior of a large language model (LLM)?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪种提示攻击直接暴露了大型语言模型（LLM）的配置行为？
models.Question.explanation_en: "Extracting the prompt template" is a type of prompting attack that involves directly exposing the configured behavior or the underlying system prompt of a large language model (LLM). This attack can reveal sensitive details about how the model operates, including its internal instructions or restrictions, which are typically not intended to be disclosed to the user. Such an exposure can compromise the security and reliability of the LLM by making it vulnerable to further exploitation or misuse.
models.Question.explanation_cn: "提取提示模板"是一种提示攻击，涉及直接暴露大型语言模型（LLM）的配置行为或底层系统提示。这种攻击可能会揭示有关模型如何运作的敏感细节，包括其内部指令或限制，这些通常不应向用户披露。这种暴露可能会危及LLM的安全性和可靠性，使其容易受到进一步的利用或滥用。

models.Question.question_en: A social media company wants to use a large language model (LLM) to summarize messages. The company has chosen a few LLMs that are available on Amazon SageMaker JumpStart. The company wants to compare the generated output toxicity of these models. Which strategy gives the company the ability to evaluate the LLMs with the LEAST operational overhead?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家社交媒体公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLM）来总结消息。该公司选择了一些在亚马逊SageMaker JumpStart上可用的LLM。该公司希望比较这些模型生成的输出毒性。哪种策略使公司能够以最少的操作开销评估LLM？
models.Question.explanation_en: Automatic model evaluation is the strategy that allows the company to evaluate the LLMs with the least operational overhead. This method leverages automated tools and processes to assess the toxicity or quality of the generated output without the need for manual intervention or crowd-sourced input. By using pre-built evaluation metrics or toxicity detection models, the company can quickly and efficiently evaluate multiple models without the complexity and time required for human evaluations.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 自动模型评估是允许公司以最少操作开销评估LLM的策略。这种方法利用自动化工具和流程来评估生成输出的毒性或质量，而无需人工干预或众包输入。通过使用预构建的评估指标或毒性检测模型，公司可以快速有效地评估多个模型，而无需人类评估所需的复杂性和时间。

models.Question.question_en: What are tokens in the context of generative AI models?
models.Question.question_cn: 在生成性人工智能模型的上下文中，什么是令牌？
models.Question.explanation_en: Tokens are the smallest units (e.g., words, subwords, or characters) that generative AI models use to process text. They form the basis of both the input given to and the output generated by the model. The other options do not accurately describe tokens in this context.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 令牌是生成性人工智能模型用于处理文本的最小单位（例如，单词、子词或字符）。它们构成了输入和模型生成的输出的基础。其他选项并未准确描述此上下文中的令牌。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using Amazon SageMaker Studio notebooks to build and train ML models. The company stores the data in an Amazon S3 bucket. The company needs to manage the flow of data from Amazon S3 to SageMaker Studio notebooks. Which solution will meet this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用 Amazon SageMaker Studio 笔记本来构建和训练机器学习模型。该公司将数据存储在 Amazon S3 存储桶中。该公司需要管理从 Amazon S3 到 SageMaker Studio 笔记本的数据流。哪种解决方案可以满足这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Configuring Amazon SageMaker to use a VPC with an S3 endpoint ensures secure, direct, and managed data flow between Amazon S3 and SageMaker Studio notebooks. This setup avoids public internet exposure and maintains data integrity during transfers. The other options do not provide a solution for managing the data flow in this context.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 将 Amazon SageMaker 配置为使用带有 S3 端点的 VPC 可确保 Amazon S3 和 SageMaker Studio 笔记本之间的安全、直接和受管理的数据流。此设置避免了公共互联网的暴露，并在传输过程中保持数据完整性。其他选项未能提供在此上下文中管理数据流的解决方案。

models.Question.question_en: A company needs to use Amazon SageMaker for model training and inference. The company must comply with regulatory requirements to run SageMaker jobs in an isolated environment without internet access. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司需要使用 Amazon SageMaker 进行模型训练和推理。该公司必须遵守监管要求，在没有互联网访问的隔离环境中运行 SageMaker 作业。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Network isolation in Amazon SageMaker allows you to run training and inference jobs in an environment that does not have access to the internet. This helps ensure that the data and the model do not inadvertently access external resources, meeting regulatory compliance requirements for isolated environments.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker 中的网络隔离允许您在没有互联网访问的环境中运行训练和推理作业。这有助于确保数据和模型不会无意中访问外部资源，从而满足隔离环境的监管合规要求。

models.Question.question_en: A company is testing the security of a foundation model (FM). During testing, the company wants to get around the safety features and make harmful content. Which security technique is this an example of?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在测试基础模型（FM）的安全性。在测试过程中，公司希望绕过安全功能并生成有害内容。这是哪个安全技术的例子？
models.Question.explanation_en: "Jailbreaking" refers to attempts to bypass or disable the built-in safety features and restrictions of a system, in this case, a foundation model (FM). This technique involves trying to circumvent the safeguards that prevent the model from generating harmful or unsafe content. Jailbreaking is often performed to exploit vulnerabilities in a model’s filtering or safety protocols, making it a direct attempt to undermine its protections.
models.Question.explanation_cn: "越狱"是指试图绕过或禁用系统内置的安全功能和限制的尝试，在这种情况下，是基础模型（FM）。这种技术涉及试图规避防护措施，以防止模型生成有害或不安全的内容。越狱通常是为了利用模型过滤或安全协议中的漏洞，直接试图削弱其保护措施。

models.Question.question_en: An ML research team develops custom ML models. The model artifacts are shared with other teams for integration into products and services. The ML team retains the model training code and data. The ML team wants to build a mechanism that the ML team can use to audit models. Which solution should the ML team use when publishing the custom ML models?
models.Question.question_cn: 一个机器学习研究团队开发自定义机器学习模型。模型工件与其他团队共享，以便集成到产品和服务中。机器学习团队保留模型训练代码和数据。机器学习团队希望建立一个机制，以便他们可以审计模型。机器学习团队在发布自定义机器学习模型时应该使用什么解决方案？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Model Cards are designed to document the essential details about machine learning models, including their intended uses, training datasets, training parameters, evaluation metrics, and inference environment. This provides a centralized mechanism to store and audit the metadata of the models, which is ideal for the ML team's need to share and audit models effectively. Key benefits of Amazon SageMaker Model Cards: Standardized documentation of models' characteristics and intended use cases. Transparency and traceability for auditing purposes. Integration with other AWS services for lifecycle management.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker 模型卡旨在记录有关机器学习模型的基本细节，包括其预期用途、训练数据集、训练参数、评估指标和推理环境。这提供了一种集中机制来存储和审计模型的元数据，非常适合机器学习团队有效共享和审计模型的需求。Amazon SageMaker 模型卡的主要好处：模型特征和预期用例的标准化文档。审计目的的透明性和可追溯性。与其他 AWS 服务的集成以进行生命周期管理。

models.Question.question_en:
A company is developing a mobile ML app that uses a phone's camera to diagnose and treat insect bites.
The company wants to train an image classification model by using a diverse dataset of insect bite photos
from different genders, ethnicities, and geographic locations around the world.
Which principle of responsible AI does the company demonstrate in this scenario?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司正在开发一款移动机器学习应用程序，利用手机摄像头来诊断和治疗虫咬。
该公司希望通过使用来自不同性别、种族和地理位置的多样化虫咬照片数据集来训练图像分类模型。
在这种情况下，该公司体现了负责任的人工智能的哪个原则？
models.Question.explanation_en:
The company is actively seeking to ensure that the image classification model is trained on a diverse
dataset that includes insect bite photos from various genders, ethnicities, and geographic locations. This
reflects the fairness principle of responsible AI, which emphasizes creating models that make unbiased
decisions across all demographic groups. By including a diverse range of data, the company is aiming to
prevent biases that could lead to inaccurate diagnoses or treatments for certain groups of people.

Fairness ensures that AI systems do not discriminate based on race, gender, geography, or other
characteristics.
models.Question.explanation_cn:
该公司积极寻求确保图像分类模型在多样化的数据集上进行训练，该数据集包括来自不同性别、种族和地理位置的虫咬照片。这反映了负责任的人工智能的公平原则，强调创建能够在所有人口群体中做出无偏见决策的模型。通过包含多样化的数据，该公司旨在防止可能导致对某些人群的诊断或治疗不准确的偏见。

公平性确保人工智能系统不基于种族、性别、地理或其他特征进行歧视。

models.Question.question_en: A retail store wants to predict the demand for a specific product for the next few weeks by using the Amazon SageMaker DeepAR forecasting algorithm. Which type of data will meet this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家零售店希望通过使用亚马逊SageMaker DeepAR预测算法来预测未来几周特定产品的需求。哪种类型的数据可以满足这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: The Amazon SageMaker DeepAR forecasting algorithm is specifically designed for forecasting scalar (one-dimensional) time series data using recurrent neural networks (RNNs). It excels when trained on datasets containing hundreds of related time series, enabling it to learn patterns across multiple series and provide accurate forecasts. Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/deepar.html
models.Question.explanation_cn: 亚马逊SageMaker DeepAR预测算法专门用于使用递归神经网络（RNN）预测标量（单维）时间序列数据。当在包含数百个相关时间序列的数据集上进行训练时，它表现出色，能够学习多个序列之间的模式并提供准确的预测。参考文献：https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/deepar.html

models.Question.question_en: A software company builds tools for customers. The company wants to use AI to increase software development productivity. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家软件公司为客户构建工具。该公司希望利用人工智能提高软件开发生产力。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Natural language processing (NLP) tools can be used to generate code from high-level descriptions or suggestions, which can greatly enhance software development productivity.
