By leveraging NLP models, developers can automate repetitive coding tasks, generate code snippets, or even complete blocks of code based on natural language inputs. This can speed up development and reduce errors.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 自然语言处理（NLP）工具可以根据高级描述或建议生成代码，这可以大大提高软件开发的生产力。通过利用NLP模型，开发人员可以自动化重复的编码任务，生成代码片段，甚至根据自然语言输入完成代码块。这可以加快开发速度并减少错误。

models.Question.question_en: Which prompting technique can protect against prompt injection attacks?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪种提示技术可以防止提示注入攻击？
models.Question.explanation_en: Adversarial prompting is a technique used to defend against prompt injection attacks by crafting inputs that are specifically designed to identify and neutralize malicious prompts. This approach involves generating prompts that can detect and mitigate adversarial inputs, thereby enhancing the robustness of language models against such attacks.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 对抗性提示是一种用于防御提示注入攻击的技术，通过精心设计输入来识别和中和恶意提示。该方法涉及生成能够检测和减轻对抗性输入的提示，从而增强语言模型对这些攻击的鲁棒性。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to implement a large language model (LLM) based chatbot to provide customer service agents with real-time contextual responses to customers' inquiries. The company will use the company's policies as the knowledge base. Which solution will meet these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望实施基于大型语言模型（LLM）的聊天机器人，为客户服务代表提供实时的上下文响应，以回答客户的询问。该公司将使用公司的政策作为知识库。哪种解决方案最具成本效益地满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) integrates external data sources with LLMs to produce accurate and contextually relevant outputs without the need for extensive retraining. By connecting the chatbot to the company's policy documents, RAG enables the model to retrieve pertinent information in real-time, ensuring responses are both accurate and up-to-date. This approach is cost-effective as it leverages existing data without the computational expenses associated with retraining or fine-tuning large models. Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/what-is/retrieval-augmented-generation/
models.Question.explanation_cn: 检索增强生成（RAG）将外部数据源与大型语言模型（LLMs）集成，以生成准确且上下文相关的输出，而无需进行广泛的再训练。通过将聊天机器人连接到公司的政策文件，RAG使模型能够实时检索相关信息，确保响应既准确又最新。这种方法具有成本效益，因为它利用现有数据，而无需承担与再训练或微调大型模型相关的计算费用。参考：https://aws.amazon.com/what-is/retrieval-augmented-generation/

models.Question.question_en: A company has fine-tuned a large language model (LLM) to answer questions for a help desk. The company wants to determine if the fine-tuning has enhanced the model's accuracy. Which metric should the company use for the evaluation?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司对大型语言模型（LLM）进行了微调，以回答帮助台的问题。该公司希望确定微调是否提高了模型的准确性。公司应该使用哪个指标进行评估？
models.Question.explanation_en: The F1 score is a metric that combines precision and recall into a single value, providing a balance between the two. It is particularly useful in evaluating models where there is an uneven class distribution, as it considers both false positives and false negatives. The F1 score is calculated as the harmonic mean of precision and recall: This metric ranges from 0 to 1, with 1 indicating perfect precision and recall. In the context of evaluating a fine-tuned large language model (LLM) for a help desk application, the F1 score is appropriate because it assesses the model's ability to provide accurate and relevant responses, balancing the trade-off between precision (correctness of responses) and recall (completeness of relevant responses). Reference: https://arize.com/blog-course/f1-score/
models.Question.explanation_cn: F1分数是一种将精确度和召回率结合成单一值的指标，提供了两者之间的平衡。它在评估类别分布不均的模型时特别有用，因为它考虑了假阳性和假阴性。F1分数是精确度和召回率的调和平均值：该指标的范围从0到1，1表示完美的精确度和召回率。在评估针对帮助台应用的微调大型语言模型（LLM）时，F1分数是合适的，因为它评估模型提供准确和相关响应的能力，平衡了精确度（响应的正确性）和召回率（相关响应的完整性）之间的权衡。参考：https://arize.com/blog-course/f1-score/

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to create a new solution by using AWS Glue. The company has minimal programming experience with AWS Glue. Which AWS service can help the company use AWS Glue?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过使用AWS Glue来创建新的解决方案。该公司在AWS Glue方面具有最少的编程经验。哪种AWS服务可以帮助该公司使用AWS Glue？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Q Developer is a tool designed to help users with minimal programming experience to work with AWS Glue. It provides a graphical user interface and simplifies the creation of data transformation and extraction workflows, allowing users to perform tasks like querying and working with data without needing deep coding skills.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Q Developer是一种旨在帮助具有最少编程经验的用户使用AWS Glue的工具。它提供了图形用户界面，并简化了数据转换和提取工作流程的创建，使用户能够执行查询和处理数据等任务，而无需深入的编程技能。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) with Amazon Bedrock and Stable Diffusion to generate product images based on text descriptions. The results are often random and lack specific details. The company wants to increase the specificity of the generated images. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用检索增强生成（RAG）与Amazon Bedrock和Stable Diffusion根据文本描述生成产品图像。结果通常是随机的，缺乏具体细节。公司希望增加生成图像的具体性。哪种解决方案符合这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: In Stable Diffusion, the classifier-free guidance (CFG) scale parameter controls how closely the generated image adheres to the provided text prompt. By increasing the CFG scale, the model places more emphasis on the prompt, leading to images that more accurately reflect the specified details. However, it's important to balance this setting, as excessively high values can result in less diverse and potentially lower-quality images.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在稳定扩散中，无分类器指导（CFG）比例参数控制生成的图像与提供的文本提示的接近程度。通过增加CFG比例，模型更加强调提示，导致更准确反映指定细节的图像。然而，平衡这个设置很重要，因为过高的值可能导致图像缺乏多样性且潜在质量较低。

models.Question.question_en: A large retail bank wants to develop an ML system to help the risk management team decide on loan allocations for different demographics. What must the bank do to develop an unbiased ML model?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家大型零售银行希望开发一个机器学习系统，以帮助风险管理团队决定不同人口统计特征的贷款分配。银行必须做些什么才能开发出一个无偏见的机器学习模型？
models.Question.explanation_en: In machine learning, class imbalance occurs when certain classes are underrepresented in the training dataset, leading to biased model predictions. To develop an unbiased model, it's crucial to assess the class distribution and adjust the training process to address any imbalances. This can be achieved through techniques such as oversampling the minority class, undersampling the majority class, or applying class weights to ensure the model treats all classes equitably.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在机器学习中，类别不平衡发生在某些类别在训练数据集中代表性不足，从而导致模型预测偏见。为了开发一个无偏见的模型，评估类别分布并调整训练过程以解决任何不平衡是至关重要的。这可以通过技术实现，例如对少数类进行过采样，对多数类进行欠采样，或应用类别权重，以确保模型公平对待所有类别。

models.Question.question_en: A company is implementing intelligent agents to provide conversational search experiences for its customers. The company needs a database service that will support storage and queries of embeddings from a generative AI model as vectors in the database. Which AWS service will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在实施智能代理，为其客户提供对话式搜索体验。该公司需要一种数据库服务，以支持将生成性人工智能模型的嵌入作为向量存储和查询。哪种AWS服务能够满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL is a relational database service that supports a wide range of applications, including those that require vector-based operations. Specifically, Aurora PostgreSQL can be extended with vector search capabilities using extensions like pgvector. This extension allows you to store, index, and query vector embeddings from generative AI models, making it well-suited for the company's needs to store and query embeddings as vectors. pgvector is an extension for PostgreSQL that provides efficient similarity search for vector data, which is ideal for storing and querying embeddings.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Aurora PostgreSQL是一种关系数据库服务，支持广泛的应用程序，包括那些需要基于向量的操作的应用程序。具体而言，Aurora PostgreSQL可以通过使用pgvector等扩展来扩展向量搜索功能。该扩展允许您存储、索引和查询来自生成性人工智能模型的向量嵌入，使其非常适合公司存储和查询嵌入作为向量的需求。pgvector是PostgreSQL的一个扩展，提供对向量数据的高效相似性搜索，非常适合存储和查询嵌入。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use large language models (LLMs) to produce code from natural language code comments. Which LLM feature meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLMs）从自然语言代码注释中生成代码。哪个LLM特性满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Text generation is the feature of large language models (LLMs) that enables them to produce text based on a given prompt or input. In this scenario, the input would be natural language code comments, and the LLM would generate code based on those comments. This process involves understanding the context of the comment and generating corresponding code, which is the core functionality of text generation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 文本生成是大型语言模型（LLMs）的一个特性，使其能够根据给定的提示或输入生成文本。在这种情况下，输入将是自然语言代码注释，而LLM将根据这些注释生成代码。这个过程涉及理解注释的上下文并生成相应的代码，这是文本生成的核心功能。

models.Question.question_en: A company notices that its foundation model (FM) generates images that are unrelated to the prompts. The company wants to modify the prompt techniques to decrease unrelated images. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司注意到其基础模型（FM）生成的图像与提示无关。该公司希望修改提示技术，以减少无关图像。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Negative prompts are used to explicitly instruct the model about what to avoid or not generate. By providing the model with specific guidance on what is not desired (e.g., by including terms or concepts that should not appear in the image), the model can better focus on generating relevant and related content. This technique can help reduce unrelated or irrelevant images by constraining the model's creative generation process.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 负面提示用于明确指示模型应避免或不生成的内容。通过向模型提供关于不希望出现的内容的具体指导（例如，包含不应出现在图像中的术语或概念），模型可以更好地专注于生成相关和相关的内容。这种技术可以通过限制模型的创造性生成过程来帮助减少无关或不相关的图像。

models.Question.question_en: A company is developing an ML model to predict customer churn. The model performs well on the training dataset but does not accurately predict churn for new data. Which solution will resolve this issue?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在开发一个机器学习模型来预测客户流失。该模型在训练数据集上表现良好，但无法准确预测新数据的流失。哪种解决方案可以解决这个问题？
models.Question.explanation_en: The issue described is a common case of overfitting, where the model performs well on the training data but fails to generalize to new, unseen data. This suggests that the model is too complex and has learned to memorize the training data rather than identifying generalizable patterns. Increasing the regularization parameter helps to reduce model complexity by penalizing large weights, thereby encouraging simpler models that are less likely to overfit. This will improve the model's ability to generalize to new data, potentially improving performance on unseen customer data.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 所描述的问题是过拟合的常见案例，模型在训练数据上表现良好，但无法对新的、未见过的数据进行泛化。这表明模型过于复杂，已经学会了记忆训练数据，而不是识别可泛化的模式。增加正则化参数有助于通过惩罚大权重来降低模型复杂性，从而鼓励更简单的模型，这些模型不太可能过拟合。这将提高模型对新数据的泛化能力，可能改善在未见过的客户数据上的表现。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to use a large language model (LLM) to generate concise, feature-specific descriptions for the company’s products. Which prompt engineering technique meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLM）为公司的产品生成简洁、特定功能的描述。哪种提示工程技术满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: To generate concise, feature-specific descriptions for each product, the company should create prompts tailored to specific product categories. By highlighting the key features of each product category in the prompt, the model can focus on generating descriptions that are relevant and aligned with the unique attributes of each product. Additionally, specifying the desired output format and length ensures that the responses meet the company's requirements for conciseness and clarity. Tailored prompts help ensure the model generates relevant and accurate descriptions by focusing on the most important features of each product category. Desired output format and length ensure the responses are consistent and concise, as required.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为了为每个产品生成简洁、特定功能的描述，公司应该创建针对特定产品类别的提示。通过在提示中突出每个产品类别的关键特征，模型可以专注于生成与每个产品的独特属性相关且一致的描述。此外，指定所需的输出格式和长度确保响应符合公司的简洁性和清晰性要求。量身定制的提示有助于确保模型生成相关和准确的描述，专注于每个产品类别中最重要的特征。所需的输出格式和长度确保响应一致且简洁，符合要求。

models.Question.question_en: A company has developed a generative text summarization model by using Amazon Bedrock. The company will use Amazon Bedrock automatic model evaluation capabilities. Which metric should the company use to evaluate the accuracy of the model?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司通过使用亚马逊Bedrock开发了一种生成文本摘要模型。该公司将使用亚马逊Bedrock的自动模型评估能力。该公司应该使用哪种指标来评估模型的准确性？
models.Question.explanation_en: BERTScore is a metric specifically designed for evaluating the quality of text generated by models, particularly in tasks like text summarization and machine translation. It uses contextual embeddings from a pre-trained BERT model to compare generated text with reference text at the word level, making it well-suited for evaluating the accuracy of generative text summarization models. BERTScore assesses the semantic similarity between the generated text and the reference text, providing a more nuanced evaluation compared to traditional methods that focus on exact matches.
models.Question.explanation_cn: BERTScore是一种专门用于评估模型生成文本质量的指标，特别是在文本摘要和机器翻译等任务中。它使用来自预训练BERT模型的上下文嵌入，在词汇层面上将生成的文本与参考文本进行比较，使其非常适合评估生成文本摘要模型的准确性。BERTScore评估生成文本与参考文本之间的语义相似性，与传统的关注精确匹配的方法相比，提供了更细致的评估。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner wants to predict the classification of flowers based on petal length, petal width, sepal length, and sepal width. Which algorithm meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者希望根据花瓣长度、花瓣宽度、萼片长度和萼片宽度来预测花的分类。哪种算法满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: K-nearest neighbors (k-NN) is a supervised learning algorithm used for classification tasks. It works by classifying a data point based on how its features (such as petal length, petal width, sepal length, and sepal width in this case) are similar to the data points in the training set. For this problem, where the task is to classify flowers based on their features, k-NN is an appropriate choice. k-NN is simple and effective for classification problems where the decision boundary is not necessarily linear, as it looks at the closest neighbors to make predictions.
models.Question.explanation_cn: K近邻（k-NN）是一种用于分类任务的监督学习算法。它通过根据数据点的特征（在本例中为花瓣长度、花瓣宽度、萼片长度和萼片宽度）与训练集中数据点的相似性来对数据点进行分类。对于这个问题，任务是根据花的特征进行分类，k-NN是一个合适的选择。k-NN对于决策边界不一定是线性的分类问题简单有效，因为它查看最近的邻居来进行预测。

models.Question.question_en: A company is introducing a mobile app that helps users learn foreign languages. The app makes text more coherent by calling a large language model (LLM). The company collected a diverse dataset of text and supplemented the dataset with examples of more readable versions. The company wants the LLM output to resemble the provided examples. Which metric should the company use to assess whether the LLM meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在推出一款帮助用户学习外语的移动应用程序。该应用程序通过调用大型语言模型（LLM）使文本更加连贯。公司收集了多样化的文本数据集，并用更易读版本的示例补充了该数据集。公司希望LLM的输出与提供的示例相似。公司应该使用哪种指标来评估LLM是否满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: ROUGE is a set of metrics that evaluates the quality of summaries by comparing the overlap of n-grams, word sequences, and word pairs between the model output and reference examples. Since the company is working on a language model that improves the coherence of text and wants the output to resemble the provided examples (which are more readable versions of the original text), ROUGE is the most appropriate metric. It assesses how closely the generated text matches the reference text in terms of content and readability. ROUGE score is commonly used to evaluate the performance of models in tasks like summarization, where the goal is to ensure the generated text aligns closely with human-provided examples.
models.Question.explanation_cn: ROUGE是一组指标，通过比较模型输出与参考示例之间的n-gram、词序列和词对的重叠来评估摘要的质量。由于公司正在开发一种提高文本连贯性的语言模型，并希望输出与提供的示例（这些示例是原始文本的更易读版本）相似，因此ROUGE是最合适的指标。它评估生成的文本在内容和可读性方面与参考文本的匹配程度。ROUGE分数通常用于评估模型在摘要等任务中的表现，其目标是确保生成的文本与人类提供的示例紧密对齐。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using custom models in Amazon Bedrock for a generative AI application. The company wants to use a company managed encryption key to encrypt the model artifacts that the model customization jobs create. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用 Amazon Bedrock 中的自定义模型来开发生成式 AI 应用程序。该公司希望使用公司管理的加密密钥来加密模型定制作业创建的模型工件。哪个 AWS 服务满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) is a fully managed service that allows you to create and control encryption keys used to encrypt your data. It is ideal for scenarios like this, where a company wants to use a custom, company-managed encryption key to protect model artifacts. AWS KMS allows you to securely manage keys for encrypting and decrypting data, and it integrates with various AWS services, including Amazon Bedrock. AWS KMS provides centralized key management, and it is designed for use cases that involve encrypting both data and artifacts, such as model customization jobs.
models.Question.explanation_cn: AWS 密钥管理服务 (AWS KMS) 是一项完全托管的服务，允许您创建和控制用于加密数据的加密密钥。它非常适合这样的场景，即公司希望使用自定义的、公司管理的加密密钥来保护模型工件。AWS KMS 允许您安全地管理用于加密和解密数据的密钥，并与包括 Amazon Bedrock 在内的各种 AWS 服务集成。AWS KMS 提供集中式密钥管理，旨在用于涉及加密数据和工件的用例，例如模型定制作业。

models.Question.question_en: A company is developing an ML model to make loan approvals. The company must implement a solution to detect bias in the model. The company must also be able to explain the model's predictions. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在开发一个机器学习模型来进行贷款审批。该公司必须实施一个解决方案，以检测模型中的偏见。该公司还必须能够解释模型的预测。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Clarify is a tool that helps detect bias in machine learning models and provides explainability for model predictions. It allows users to understand the factors influencing a model's predictions and assess whether the model is fair across different demographic groups. This is exactly what the company needs for detecting bias and explaining model decisions, especially for high-stakes applications like loan approvals. Bias detection: SageMaker Clarify can analyze the training data and the model's predictions to identify and mitigate bias. Explainability: It provides features for explaining the predictions made by the model, which helps users understand the reasons behind the model's decisions.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker Clarify 是一个帮助检测机器学习模型中偏见的工具，并为模型预测提供可解释性。它允许用户理解影响模型预测的因素，并评估模型在不同人口群体中的公平性。这正是公司在检测偏见和解释模型决策时所需要的，尤其是在贷款审批等高风险应用中。偏见检测：SageMaker Clarify 可以分析训练数据和模型的预测，以识别和减轻偏见。可解释性：它提供了解释模型所做预测的功能，帮助用户理解模型决策背后的原因。

models.Question.question_en: A company needs to train an ML model to classify images of different types of animals. The company has a large dataset of labeled images and will not label more data. Which type of learning should the company use to train the model?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司需要训练一个机器学习模型来分类不同类型动物的图像。该公司拥有一个大型标记图像数据集，并且不会标记更多数据。该公司应该使用哪种学习类型来训练模型？
models.Question.explanation_en: In supervised learning, the model is trained using a labeled dataset, where each image (input) has a corresponding label (the type of animal, in this case). Since the company already has a large dataset of labeled images, supervised learning is the most appropriate approach. The model learns to classify the images based on the features and labels in the training data.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在监督学习中，模型使用标记数据集进行训练，其中每个图像（输入）都有一个相应的标签（在这种情况下是动物的类型）。由于该公司已经拥有一个大型标记图像数据集，因此监督学习是最合适的方法。模型根据训练数据中的特征和标签学习对图像进行分类。

models.Question.question_en:
A manufacturing company uses AI to inspect products and find any damages or defects.
Which type of AI application is the company using?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家制造公司使用人工智能检查产品并发现任何损坏或缺陷。
该公司使用哪种类型的人工智能应用？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Computer vision is a field of AI that enables machines to interpret and understand visual information from
the world, such as images and videos. In the case of the manufacturing company, the AI is used to inspect
products for damages or defects, which involves analyzing visual data (e.g., product images or videos). This
is a classic application of computer vision, where the AI system identifies and classifies objects or defects
within images.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 计算机视觉是人工智能的一个领域，使机器能够解释和理解来自世界的视觉信息，例如图像和视频。在制造公司的案例中，人工智能用于检查产品的损坏或缺陷，这涉及分析视觉数据（例如，产品图像或视频）。这是计算机视觉的经典应用，人工智能系统在图像中识别和分类对象或缺陷。

models.Question.question_en:
A company wants to build a lead prioritization application for its employees to contact potential customers.
The application must give employees the ability to view and adjust the weights assigned to different
variables in the model based on domain knowledge and expertise.
Which ML model type meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司希望为其员工建立一个潜在客户优先级应用程序，以便联系潜在客户。
该应用程序必须使员工能够根据领域知识和专业知识查看和调整分配给不同变量的权重。
哪种机器学习模型类型满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en:
A logistic regression model is a simple, interpretable machine learning model that allows users to adjust
the weights of different variables based on domain knowledge and expertise. Since logistic regression is
based on a linear relationship between the input features and the predicted outcome, each feature has a
corresponding weight (coefficient) that can be easily viewed and adjusted. This makes it a suitable choice
for a lead prioritization application where domain experts need the ability to modify the model based on their
knowledge.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 逻辑回归模型是一种简单、可解释的机器学习模型，允许用户根据领域知识和专业知识调整不同变量的权重。由于逻辑回归基于输入特征与预测结果之间的线性关系，每个特征都有一个对应的权重（系数），可以轻松查看和调整。这使得它成为潜在客户优先级应用程序的合适选择，在该应用程序中，领域专家需要能够根据他们的知识修改模型。

models.Question.question_en: A company has developed an ML model to predict real estate sale prices. The company wants to deploy the model to make predictions without managing servers or infrastructure. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司开发了一个机器学习模型来预测房地产销售价格。该公司希望部署该模型，以便在不管理服务器或基础设施的情况下进行预测。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker provides a fully managed service for deploying machine learning models at scale without needing to manage servers or infrastructure. When you deploy a model using Amazon SageMaker endpoints, it handles all the infrastructure, scaling, and maintenance aspects. This allows the company to focus solely on making predictions and integrating the model into their application, without worrying about managing servers or clusters. Amazon SageMaker simplifies the deployment of ML models by providing scalable, secure, and serverless endpoints, which are ideal for serving predictions in real-time.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker 提供了一项完全托管的服务，用于大规模部署机器学习模型，而无需管理服务器或基础设施。当您使用 Amazon SageMaker 端点部署模型时，它会处理所有基础设施、扩展和维护方面的工作。这使得公司可以专注于进行预测并将模型集成到他们的应用程序中，而无需担心管理服务器或集群。Amazon SageMaker 通过提供可扩展、安全和无服务器的端点简化了机器学习模型的部署，这些端点非常适合实时提供预测。

models.Question.question_en: A financial institution is building an AI solution to make loan approval decisions by using a foundation model (FM). For security and audit purposes, the company needs the AI solution's decisions to be explainable. Which factor relates to the explainability of the AI solution's decisions?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家金融机构正在构建一个AI解决方案，通过使用基础模型（FM）来做出贷款批准决策。出于安全和审计的目的，公司需要AI解决方案的决策是可解释的。哪个因素与AI解决方案决策的可解释性相关？
models.Question.explanation_en: Model complexity plays a significant role in the explainability of an AI solution. Simpler models tend to be more explainable because it is easier to understand how they make decisions. For example, linear regression or decision trees are generally easier to interpret compared to more complex models like deep neural networks. In contrast, highly complex models, such as deep learning models, may provide very accurate results but are often considered 'black boxes,' meaning their decision-making process is not easily interpretable. This lack of transparency makes it difficult to explain their decisions in a way that satisfies regulatory requirements or customer understanding.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 模型复杂性在AI解决方案的可解释性中起着重要作用。较简单的模型往往更容易解释，因为更容易理解它们如何做出决策。例如，线性回归或决策树通常比深度神经网络等更复杂的模型更容易解释。相反，高度复杂的模型，如深度学习模型，可能提供非常准确的结果，但通常被认为是“黑箱”，这意味着它们的决策过程不容易被解释。这种缺乏透明度使得很难以满足监管要求或客户理解的方式来解释它们的决策。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to develop an AI application to help its employees check open customer claims, identify details for a specific claim, and access documents for a claim. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望开发一个人工智能应用程序，以帮助员工检查未解决的客户索赔，识别特定索赔的详细信息，并访问索赔的文件。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock is a service that allows you to build AI-powered applications using foundation models (FMs) without managing infrastructure. Agents for Amazon Bedrock allows you to create intelligent agents that can help users interact with data and perform tasks such as checking open customer claims, identifying claim details, and accessing relevant documents. By using Amazon Bedrock knowledge bases, the AI agent can access relevant information (e.g., details about claims, documents, or customer data) in real time, and provide precise, context-driven answers based on the claim-related data stored in the knowledge base. Agents for Amazon Bedrock can help automate interactions by understanding and responding to natural language queries, making it a good fit for this use case. Amazon Bedrock knowledge bases enable the system to access stored information, documents, and details for specific claims efficiently.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock 是一项服务，允许您使用基础模型 (FMs) 构建 AI 驱动的应用程序，而无需管理基础设施。Amazon Bedrock 的代理允许您创建智能代理，帮助用户与数据互动并执行任务，例如检查未解决的客户索赔、识别索赔详细信息和访问相关文件。通过使用 Amazon Bedrock 知识库，AI 代理可以实时访问相关信息（例如，索赔的详细信息、文件或客户数据），并根据存储在知识库中的与索赔相关的数据提供精确的、基于上下文的答案。Amazon Bedrock 的代理可以通过理解和响应自然语言查询来帮助自动化交互，使其非常适合此用例。Amazon Bedrock 知识库使系统能够高效访问存储的信息、文件和特定索赔的详细信息。

models.Question.question_en: A pharmaceutical company wants to analyze user reviews of new medications and provide a concise overview for each medication. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家制药公司希望分析新药的用户评论，并为每种药物提供简明的概述。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock provides access to a variety of large language models (LLMs), which are well-suited for tasks such as text summarization. By using LLMs, the pharmaceutical company can automatically generate concise and coherent summaries of user reviews for each medication. These models are designed to understand and process large amounts of text, making them ideal for summarizing user reviews in a clear and efficient manner. Amazon Bedrock allows the company to utilize LLMs that can generate summaries, which is exactly what is needed in this case.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock 提供访问多种大型语言模型（LLMs），这些模型非常适合文本摘要等任务。通过使用 LLMs，制药公司可以自动生成每种药物用户评论的简明且连贯的摘要。这些模型旨在理解和处理大量文本，使其非常适合以清晰高效的方式总结用户评论。Amazon Bedrock 允许公司利用能够生成摘要的 LLMs，这正是此案例所需的。

models.Question.question_en: Which phase of the ML lifecycle determines compliance and regulatory requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 机器学习生命周期的哪个阶段决定了合规性和监管要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: The data collection phase of the ML lifecycle is the most relevant for determining compliance and regulatory requirements. During this phase, organizations must ensure that the data being collected and used for training the model complies with legal and regulatory standards, such as data privacy laws (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA), industry-specific regulations, and ethical considerations. The organization must also verify that they have the proper consent to use the data and that the data does not contain any biases or violate any regulations.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 机器学习生命周期的数据收集阶段与确定合规性和监管要求最为相关。在此阶段，组织必须确保所收集和用于训练模型的数据符合法律和监管标准，例如数据隐私法（如GDPR、HIPAA）、行业特定法规和伦理考虑。组织还必须验证他们是否获得了使用数据的适当同意，并且数据不包含任何偏见或违反任何法规。

models.Question.question_en: Which strategy will determine if a foundation model (FM) effectively meets business objectives?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪种策略可以确定基础模型（FM）是否有效地满足商业目标？
models.Question.explanation_en: To determine if a foundation model (FM) effectively meets business objectives, the key is to assess how well the model aligns with the specific use cases or business goals it is intended to address. This involves evaluating whether the model can provide meaningful and accurate outputs relevant to the business’s needs, ensuring that it solves the real-world problems the company aims to tackle. Aligning with specific use cases ensures that the model’s capabilities are tailored to the tasks at hand, such as improving customer support, enhancing decision-making, or automating certain processes.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 要确定基础模型（FM）是否有效地满足商业目标，关键在于评估模型与其旨在解决的特定用例或商业目标的对齐程度。这涉及评估模型是否能够提供与业务需求相关的有意义和准确的输出，确保它解决了公司希望解决的现实问题。与特定用例的对齐确保模型的能力针对当前任务进行定制，例如改善客户支持、增强决策能力或自动化某些流程。

models.Question.question_en: A food service company wants to develop an ML model to help decrease daily food waste and increase sales revenue. The company needs to continuously improve the model's accuracy. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家食品服务公司希望开发一个机器学习模型，以帮助减少每日食品浪费并增加销售收入。该公司需要不断提高模型的准确性。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: To continuously improve the accuracy of the machine learning model, Amazon SageMaker is the appropriate solution. SageMaker allows for efficient model training, deployment, and iteration. The company can use SageMaker to retrain the model regularly with newer data to account for changes in customer behavior, market trends, and other dynamic factors that may affect food waste and sales revenue. Iterating with newer data helps improve the model's performance over time, ensuring it remains accurate and relevant.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为了不断提高机器学习模型的准确性，Amazon SageMaker 是合适的解决方案。SageMaker 允许高效的模型训练、部署和迭代。该公司可以定期使用更新的数据重新训练模型，以考虑客户行为、市场趋势和其他可能影响食品浪费和销售收入的动态因素的变化。使用更新的数据进行迭代有助于随着时间的推移提高模型的性能，确保其保持准确和相关。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner is developing a prompt for an Amazon Titan model. The model is hosted on Amazon Bedrock. The AI practitioner is using the model to solve numerical reasoning challenges. The AI practitioner adds the following phrase to the end of the prompt: “Ask the model to show its work by explaining its reasoning step by step.” Which prompt engineering technique is the AI practitioner using?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者正在为亚马逊Titan模型开发提示。该模型托管在亚马逊Bedrock上。该人工智能从业者正在使用该模型解决数值推理挑战。该人工智能从业者在提示的末尾添加了以下短语：“请模型通过逐步解释其推理过程来展示其工作。”该人工智能从业者使用了哪种提示工程技术？
models.Question.explanation_en: Chain-of-thought prompting is a technique in prompt engineering where the AI model is encouraged to break down its reasoning process step by step to solve a problem, such as numerical reasoning challenges. By explicitly instructing the model to "show its work by explaining its reasoning step by step," the practitioner ensures the model provides a logical sequence of intermediate steps leading to the solution. This improves the accuracy and transparency of the model's outputs, particularly for complex reasoning tasks.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 链式推理提示是一种提示工程技术，鼓励人工智能模型逐步分解其推理过程以解决问题，例如数值推理挑战。通过明确指示模型“通过逐步解释其推理过程来展示其工作”，从业者确保模型提供一系列逻辑中间步骤，最终得出解决方案。这提高了模型输出的准确性和透明度，特别是在复杂推理任务中。

models.Question.question_en: Which AWS service makes foundation models (FMs) available to help users build and scale generative AI applications?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个AWS服务提供基础模型（FMs），帮助用户构建和扩展生成式AI应用程序？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock is an AWS service that allows users to build and scale generative AI applications using foundation models (FMs) without the need to manage infrastructure. It provides access to pre-trained models from AWS and third-party providers, enabling developers to integrate generative AI capabilities like text generation, summarization, and question-answering into their applications. This makes Amazon Bedrock the ideal choice for building and scaling generative AI solutions.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock是一个AWS服务，允许用户使用基础模型（FMs）构建和扩展生成式AI应用程序，而无需管理基础设施。它提供对AWS和第三方提供的预训练模型的访问，使开发人员能够将生成式AI功能（如文本生成、摘要和问答）集成到他们的应用程序中。这使得Amazon Bedrock成为构建和扩展生成式AI解决方案的理想选择。

models.Question.question_en: An ecommerce company wants to improve search engine recommendations by customizing the results for each user of the company’s ecommerce platform. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家电子商务公司希望通过为其电子商务平台的每个用户定制结果来改善搜索引擎推荐。哪种AWS服务满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Personalize is an AWS service specifically designed to build and deploy personalized recommendations for users. It allows you to create custom machine learning models for personalized user experiences, such as product recommendations, search results, or content suggestions. For an ecommerce company aiming to improve search engine recommendations tailored to each user, Amazon Personalize is the ideal choice as it leverages user behavior data and machine learning to deliver highly relevant recommendations.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Personalize 是一项专门设计用于构建和部署个性化推荐的 AWS 服务。它允许您为个性化用户体验创建自定义机器学习模型，例如产品推荐、搜索结果或内容建议。对于一家旨在改善针对每个用户定制的搜索引擎推荐的电子商务公司，Amazon Personalize 是理想的选择，因为它利用用户行为数据和机器学习提供高度相关的推荐。

models.Question.question_en:
A company needs to monitor the performance of its ML systems by using a highly scalable AWS service.
Which AWS service meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司需要通过使用高度可扩展的AWS服务来监控其机器学习系统的性能。
哪个AWS服务满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Amazon CloudWatch is a highly scalable AWS service designed for monitoring and observability. It
provides real-time monitoring of system metrics, including performance data for ML systems, such as
resource utilization (CPU, memory, etc.), model inference latency, request counts, and errors. CloudWatch
enables users to set up alarms, visualize metrics, and automate actions based on performance thresholds,
making it ideal for monitoring the performance of ML systems.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon CloudWatch是一个高度可扩展的AWS服务，旨在进行监控和可观察性。它提供系统指标的实时监控，包括机器学习系统的性能数据，如资源利用率（CPU、内存等）、模型推理延迟、请求计数和错误。CloudWatch使用户能够设置警报、可视化指标，并根据性能阈值自动执行操作，非常适合监控机器学习系统的性能。

models.Question.question_en: Which technique can a company use to lower bias and toxicity in generative AI applications during the post-processing ML lifecycle?
models.Question.question_cn: 公司可以使用哪种技术来降低生成式人工智能应用在后处理机器学习生命周期中的偏见和毒性？
models.Question.explanation_en: Human-in-the-loop (HITL) is a technique where human oversight is involved in the decision-making process of AI systems. In the context of generative AI applications, HITL can be used during the post-processing phase to identify and mitigate biases or toxic outputs. Humans can review and intervene when the model generates inappropriate or biased content, providing corrections or adjustments that help reduce the likelihood of toxicity and bias. This feedback loop helps refine and improve the model’s outputs over time.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 人机协作（HITL）是一种技术，其中人类监督参与人工智能系统的决策过程。在生成式人工智能应用的背景下，HITL可以在后处理阶段用于识别和减轻偏见或有毒输出。当模型生成不当或有偏见的内容时，人类可以进行审查和干预，提供修正或调整，从而帮助减少毒性和偏见的可能性。这个反馈循环有助于随着时间的推移精炼和改善模型的输出。

models.Question.question_en: A bank has fine-tuned a large language model (LLM) to expedite the loan approval process. During an external audit of the model, the company discovered that the model was approving loans at a faster pace for a specific demographic than for other demographics. How should the bank fix this issue MOST cost-effectively?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家银行对大型语言模型（LLM）进行了微调，以加快贷款审批过程。在对该模型的外部审计中，公司发现该模型对特定人群的贷款审批速度快于其他人群。银行应该如何以最具成本效益的方式解决这个问题？
models.Question.explanation_en: The issue described is a case of bias in the model’s decision-making process, where the model is showing a preference for a specific demographic. The most cost-effective way to address this is to include more diverse training data that better represents all demographics. By fine-tuning the model with this more diverse data, you can help ensure that the model treats all demographic groups fairly and does not exhibit biased behavior. Fine-tuning the model with updated data ensures that the model learns from a more representative sample, improving fairness in its predictions without needing to completely retrain the model from scratch.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 所描述的问题是模型决策过程中的偏见案例，模型对特定人群表现出偏好。解决此问题的最具成本效益的方法是包含更多多样化的训练数据，以更好地代表所有人群。通过使用这些更具多样性的数据对模型进行微调，可以帮助确保模型公平对待所有人群，并且不表现出偏见行为。使用更新的数据对模型进行微调确保模型从更具代表性的样本中学习，提高其预测的公平性，而无需完全从头开始重新训练模型。

models.Question.question_en: A hospital is developing an AI system to assist doctors in diagnosing diseases based on patient records and medical images. To comply with regulations, the sensitive patient data must not leave the country the data is located in. Which data governance strategy will ensure compliance and protect patient privacy?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家医院正在开发一个人工智能系统，以帮助医生根据病人记录和医学图像诊断疾病。为了遵守法规，敏感的病人数据不得离开数据所在的国家。哪种数据治理策略可以确保合规并保护病人隐私？
models.Question.explanation_en: Data residency refers to the practice of ensuring that data is stored and processed within a specific geographical location to comply with regulations or policies. In this scenario, where sensitive patient data must not leave the country it originates from, implementing a data residency strategy ensures compliance with legal and regulatory requirements while protecting patient privacy. This approach is crucial for organizations like hospitals operating under strict data governance frameworks such as HIPAA or GDPR.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 数据驻留是指确保数据在特定地理位置存储和处理，以遵守法规或政策的做法。在这种情况下，敏感的病人数据不得离开其来源国，实施数据驻留策略可以确保遵守法律和监管要求，同时保护病人隐私。这种方法对于在严格数据治理框架下运营的组织（如医院）至关重要，例如HIPAA或GDPR。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building a mobile app for users who have a visual impairment. The app must be able to hear what users say and provide voice responses. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在为有视觉障碍的用户开发一款移动应用。该应用必须能够听到用户所说的话并提供语音响应。哪种解决方案能够满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: To meet the requirements of enabling the app to "hear what users say and provide voice responses," the solution must include speech recognition and text-to-speech capabilities. Using a deep learning neural network for speech recognition allows the app to convert spoken words into text. Once the input is understood, text-to-speech systems can provide voice responses back to users. This approach is fundamental in applications that assist users with visual impairments by enabling interaction through spoken language.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为了满足使应用能够“听到用户所说的话并提供语音响应”的要求，解决方案必须包括语音识别和文本转语音功能。使用深度学习神经网络进行语音识别可以让应用将口语转换为文本。一旦输入被理解，文本转语音系统可以向用户提供语音响应。这种方法在帮助视觉障碍用户的应用中是基础，因为它通过口语语言实现了交互。

models.Question.question_en: A company needs to log all requests made to its Amazon Bedrock API. The company must retain the logs securely for 5 years at the lowest possible cost. Which combination of AWS service and storage class meets these requirements? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司需要记录所有对其 Amazon Bedrock API 的请求。该公司必须以最低的成本安全地保留日志 5 年。哪种 AWS 服务和存储类别的组合满足这些要求？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en: AWS CloudTrail is the AWS service designed for logging and monitoring API calls made to AWS services, including Amazon Bedrock. CloudTrail records detailed information about the API requests, including the identity of the requester, the time of the request, and the source IP address. This service is ideal for logging all requests made to the Amazon Bedrock API and meets the logging requirement. Amazon S3 Intelligent-Tiering is a storage class designed for storing data that has unpredictable access patterns. It automatically moves data between two access tiers (frequent and infrequent) based on usage, which helps reduce costs while ensuring data is still available when needed. For retaining logs securely over 5 years at the lowest possible cost, this storage class provides an efficient way to handle long-term storage requirements without incurring unnecessary costs.
models.Question.explanation_cn: AWS CloudTrail 是专为记录和监控对 AWS 服务（包括 Amazon Bedrock）进行的 API 调用而设计的 AWS 服务。CloudTrail 记录有关 API 请求的详细信息，包括请求者的身份、请求时间和源 IP 地址。该服务非常适合记录对 Amazon Bedrock API 的所有请求，并满足日志记录要求。Amazon S3 Intelligent-Tiering 是一种旨在存储访问模式不可预测的数据的存储类别。它根据使用情况自动在两个访问层（频繁和不频繁）之间移动数据，这有助于降低成本，同时确保在需要时数据仍然可用。为了以最低的成本安全地保留日志 5 年，该存储类别提供了一种有效的方式来处理长期存储要求，而不会产生不必要的成本。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to create an ML model to predict customer satisfaction. The company needs fully automated model tuning. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司想要创建一个机器学习模型来预测客户满意度。该公司需要完全自动化的模型调优。哪项AWS服务满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker provides a fully managed environment for building, training, and deploying machine learning models, including automatic model tuning. Specifically, SageMaker includes a feature called Automatic Model Tuning (or Hyperparameter Optimization), which automates the process of finding the best hyperparameters for your machine learning model. This is essential when you want to optimize the model’s performance without manual intervention. Amazon SageMaker allows you to automate the training process and hyperparameter tuning, which aligns perfectly with the company's need for fully automated model tuning.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker提供了一个完全托管的环境，用于构建、训练和部署机器学习模型，包括自动模型调优。具体来说，SageMaker包含一个名为自动模型调优（或超参数优化）的功能，它自动化了寻找最佳超参数的过程。这在您希望在没有人工干预的情况下优化模型性能时至关重要。Amazon SageMaker允许您自动化训练过程和超参数调优，这与公司对完全自动化模型调优的需求完美契合。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to enhance response quality for a large language model (LLM) for complex problem-solving tasks. The tasks require detailed reasoning and a step-by-step explanation process. Which prompt engineering technique meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望提高大型语言模型（LLM）在复杂问题解决任务中的响应质量。这些任务需要详细的推理和逐步的解释过程。哪种提示工程技术满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Chain-of-thought prompting is specifically designed to enhance the reasoning capabilities of a large language model (LLM) by encouraging it to provide step-by-step explanations for complex problem-solving tasks. This approach helps the model break down a problem into smaller, logical steps, ensuring that the response is detailed, accurate, and easy to follow.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 链式思维提示专门设计用于增强大型语言模型（LLM）的推理能力，鼓励其为复杂问题解决任务提供逐步解释。这种方法帮助模型将问题分解为更小的逻辑步骤，确保响应详细、准确且易于理解。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to keep its foundation model (FM) relevant by using the most recent data. The company wants to implement a model training strategy that includes regular updates to the FM. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过使用最新数据来保持其基础模型（FM）的相关性。该公司希望实施一种模型训练策略，包括对FM的定期更新。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Continuous pre-training involves regularly updating a foundation model (FM) by training it on new data as it becomes available. This approach ensures that the model remains relevant and accurate by incorporating the most recent information. It is especially important for applications where up-to-date knowledge is crucial, such as news aggregation, customer behavior analysis, or real-time market trends.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 持续预训练涉及通过在新数据可用时定期更新基础模型（FM）。这种方法通过纳入最新信息确保模型保持相关性和准确性。对于需要最新知识的应用程序（如新闻聚合、客户行为分析或实时市场趋势），这尤其重要。

models.Question.question_en: A company’s employees provide product descriptions and recommendations to customers when customers call the customer service center. These recommendations are based on where the customers are located. The company wants to use foundation models (FMs) to automate this process. Which AWS service meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司的员工在客户拨打客服中心时向客户提供产品描述和推荐。这些推荐是基于客户的位置。该公司希望使用基础模型（FMs）来自动化此过程。哪项AWS服务满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock enables companies to use foundation models (FMs) to build and automate tasks like generating product descriptions and recommendations. It allows the integration of pre-trained FMs into applications without managing infrastructure, making it an ideal choice for automating customer service tasks. With Amazon Bedrock, the company can leverage FMs to generate tailored recommendations based on customer locations, enabling dynamic and efficient customer interactions.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock使公司能够使用基础模型（FMs）来构建和自动化任务，例如生成产品描述和推荐。它允许将预训练的FMs集成到应用程序中，而无需管理基础设施，使其成为自动化客户服务任务的理想选择。通过Amazon Bedrock，公司可以利用FMs根据客户位置生成量身定制的推荐，从而实现动态和高效的客户互动。

models.Question.question_en: A company is using a large language model (LLM) on Amazon Bedrock to build a chatbot. The chatbot processes customer support requests. To resolve a request, the customer and the chatbot must interact a few times. Which solution gives the LLM the ability to use content from previous customer messages?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用亚马逊Bedrock上的大型语言模型（LLM）来构建一个聊天机器人。该聊天机器人处理客户支持请求。为了处理请求，客户和聊天机器人必须进行几次互动。哪种解决方案使LLM能够使用之前客户消息的内容？
models.Question.explanation_en: To give a large language model (LLM) the ability to use content from previous customer messages in a conversation, the previous messages must be included in the model prompt. This technique is known as prompt engineering and allows the LLM to retain context by incorporating a history of the interaction within the prompt. By appending prior exchanges to the prompt, the model can generate contextually relevant and coherent responses throughout the multi-turn conversation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为了使大型语言模型（LLM）能够在对话中使用之前客户消息的内容，必须将之前的消息包含在模型提示中。这种技术被称为提示工程，它允许LLM通过在提示中包含交互历史来保留上下文。通过将先前的交流附加到提示中，模型可以在多轮对话中生成上下文相关且连贯的响应。

models.Question.question_en: Which option is a characteristic of AI governance frameworks for building trust and deploying human-centered AI technologies?
models.Question.question_cn: 以下哪个选项是人工智能治理框架建立信任和部署以人为中心的人工智能技术的特征？
models.Question.explanation_en: AI governance frameworks focus on building trust and ensuring the responsible deployment of AI technologies. They establish clear policies and guidelines to address critical aspects such as data management, transparency, ethical considerations, responsible AI practices, and regulatory compliance. These frameworks help organizations mitigate risks, promote fairness, and foster public trust in AI systems, making them essential for creating human-centered AI technologies.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 人工智能治理框架专注于建立信任并确保人工智能技术的负责任部署。它们建立清晰的政策和指南，以解决数据管理、透明度、伦理考虑、负责任的人工智能实践和法规合规等关键方面。这些框架帮助组织降低风险，促进公平，并促进公众对人工智能系统的信任，使其成为创建以人为中心的人工智能技术的必要条件。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to find groups for its customers based on the customers’ demographics and buying patterns. Which algorithm should the company use to meet this requirement?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望根据客户的人口统计特征和购买模式为其客户找到分组。该公司应该使用哪种算法来满足这一要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: K-means is a clustering algorithm used in unsupervised learning to group data points into clusters based on their similarities. It is well-suited for finding patterns in customer demographics and buying behavior. The algorithm identifies groups (clusters) of customers with similar characteristics, which can then be used for targeted marketing, personalized recommendations, or segmentation.
models.Question.explanation_cn: K-means是一种聚类算法，用于无监督学习，根据数据点之间的相似性将其分组到簇中。它非常适合发现客户人口统计特征和购买行为中的模式。该算法识别具有相似特征的客户组（簇），然后可以用于目标营销、个性化推荐或细分。

models.Question.question_en: An ecommerce company is using a generative AI chatbot to respond to customer inquiries. The company wants to measure the financial effect of the chatbot on the company’s operations. Which metric should the company use?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家电子商务公司正在使用生成式AI聊天机器人来回应客户咨询。该公司希望衡量聊天机器人对公司运营的财务影响。公司应该使用哪个指标？
models.Question.explanation_en: To measure the financial effect of a generative AI chatbot on the company's operations, the cost for each customer conversation is the most relevant metric. It directly quantifies the operational expense associated with using the chatbot to handle customer inquiries. By analyzing this metric, the company can evaluate how much it spends per conversation and compare it to the cost of alternative methods (e.g., human agents), providing insight into the chatbot's financial efficiency and ROI.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 为了衡量生成式AI聊天机器人对公司运营的财务影响，每次客户对话的成本是最相关的指标。它直接量化了使用聊天机器人处理客户咨询所产生的运营费用。通过分析这一指标，公司可以评估每次对话的支出，并将其与其他方法（例如人工客服）的成本进行比较，从而提供对聊天机器人财务效率和投资回报率的洞察。

models.Question.question_en: Which option is a benefit of using Amazon SageMaker Model Cards to document AI models?
models.Question.question_cn: 使用 Amazon SageMaker 模型卡来记录 AI 模型的好处是什么？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Model Cards provide a structured way to document key details about AI models, including their intended use, performance metrics, and limitations. This helps organizations maintain transparency, compliance, and governance in AI model development, making it easier to track and manage models over time.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker 模型卡提供了一种结构化的方式来记录 AI 模型的关键细节，包括其预期用途、性能指标和局限性。这有助于组织在 AI 模型开发中保持透明度、合规性和治理，使得跟踪和管理模型变得更加容易。

models.Question.question_en:
A company’s large language model (LLM) is experiencing hallucinations.
How can the company decrease hallucinations?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司的大型语言模型（LLM）正在经历幻觉。
公司如何减少幻觉？
models.Question.explanation_en:
In the context of large language models (LLMs), the temperature inference parameter controls the
randomness of the model's output. Lowering the temperature reduces randomness and makes the model's
responses more deterministic and focused on the most likely predictions. By decreasing the temperature,
the likelihood of hallucinations (when the model generates incorrect or nonsensical information) is reduced,
as the model relies more on high-probability outputs rather than exploring less likely possibilities.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在大型语言模型（LLM）的背景下，温度推理参数控制模型输出的随机性。降低温度会减少随机性，使模型的响应更加确定，集中在最可能的预测上。通过降低温度，幻觉的可能性（当模型生成不正确或无意义的信息时）会减少，因为模型更依赖于高概率输出，而不是探索不太可能的可能性。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to upload customer service email messages to Amazon S3 to develop a business analysis application. The messages sometimes contain sensitive data. The company wants to receive an alert every time sensitive information is found. Which solution fully automates the sensitive information detection process with the LEAST development effort?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望将客户服务电子邮件消息上传到Amazon S3，以开发业务分析应用程序。这些消息有时包含敏感数据。公司希望在发现敏感信息时每次都能收到警报。哪种解决方案可以在开发工作量最少的情况下完全自动化敏感信息检测过程？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Macie is a fully managed data security and privacy service that uses machine learning to discover and protect sensitive data in Amazon S3. It can automatically detect sensitive information, such as personally identifiable information (PII) or financial data, and send alerts when such data is found. This approach minimizes development effort, as it does not require custom regex patterns or model development, and it is specifically designed to handle the scenario described.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Macie是一个完全托管的数据安全和隐私服务，利用机器学习在Amazon S3中发现和保护敏感数据。它可以自动检测敏感信息，如个人可识别信息（PII）或财务数据，并在发现此类数据时发送警报。这种方法最大程度地减少了开发工作量，因为它不需要定制的正则表达式模式或模型开发，并且专门设计用于处理所描述的情况。

models.Question.question_en: Which AWS feature records details about ML instance data for governance and reporting?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个AWS功能记录有关机器学习实例数据的详细信息，以便进行治理和报告？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Model Cards record key details about machine learning models, including intended use, training data, evaluation metrics, and compliance information. They support governance and reporting by providing a standardized way to document model information throughout its lifecycle.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker模型卡记录有关机器学习模型的关键细节，包括预期用途、训练数据、评估指标和合规信息。它们通过提供标准化的方式来记录模型信息，支持治理和报告。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to identify harmful language in the comments section of social media posts by using an ML model. The company will not use labeled data to train the model. Which strategy should the company use to identify harmful language?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望通过使用机器学习模型来识别社交媒体帖子评论区中的有害语言。该公司将不使用标记数据来训练模型。该公司应该使用哪种策略来识别有害语言？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Comprehend provides pre-trained NLP models, including toxicity detection, to analyze text for harmful language. Since the company does not plan to use labeled data for training, Amazon Comprehend is a suitable choice because it does not require custom training and can automatically detect toxic or harmful content in comments.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Comprehend 提供了预训练的自然语言处理模型，包括毒性检测，用于分析文本中的有害语言。由于该公司不打算使用标记数据进行训练，Amazon Comprehend 是一个合适的选择，因为它不需要自定义训练，并且可以自动检测评论中的有毒或有害内容。

models.Question.question_en:
A manufacturing company wants to create product descriptions in multiple languages.
Which AWS service will automate this task?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家制造公司希望用多种语言创建产品描述。
哪项AWS服务可以自动化此任务？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Amazon Translate is an AWS service that automates language translation using neural machine
translation (NMT). It enables businesses to generate product descriptions in multiple languages quickly
and accurately, making it the best choice for this task.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Translate 是一项AWS服务，使用神经机器翻译（NMT）自动化语言翻译。它使企业能够快速准确地生成多种语言的产品描述，因此是此任务的最佳选择。

models.Question.question_en: What does an F1 score measure in the context of foundation model (FM) performance?
models.Question.question_cn: 在基础模型（FM）性能的背景下，F1分数测量什么？
models.Question.explanation_en: The F1 score is a metric used to evaluate the performance of a classification model by considering both precision (the proportion of correctly predicted positive cases out of all predicted positives) and recall (the proportion of correctly predicted positive cases out of all actual positives). It is the harmonic mean of precision and recall, ensuring a balance between them, especially when dealing with imbalanced datasets.
models.Question.explanation_cn: F1分数是一种用于评估分类模型性能的指标，它同时考虑了精确率（所有预测为正的案例中正确预测的正案例的比例）和召回率（所有实际为正的案例中正确预测的正案例的比例）。它是精确率和召回率的调和平均数，确保它们之间的平衡，特别是在处理不平衡数据集时。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to improve the accuracy of the responses from a generative AI application. The application uses a foundation model (FM) on Amazon Bedrock. Which solution meets these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望提高生成式人工智能应用程序响应的准确性。该应用程序在亚马逊床垫上使用基础模型（FM）。哪种解决方案最具成本效益地满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Using prompt engineering is the most cost-effective way to improve the accuracy of responses from a generative AI application without retraining or fine-tuning the foundation model (FM). Prompt engineering involves carefully designing the input prompts to guide the model toward producing better responses, improving relevance and accuracy.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 使用提示工程是提高生成式人工智能应用程序响应准确性的最具成本效益的方法，而无需重新训练或微调基础模型（FM）。提示工程涉及仔细设计输入提示，以引导模型产生更好的响应，提高相关性和准确性。

models.Question.question_en: A company is deploying AI/ML models by using AWS services. The company wants to offer transparency into the models’ decision-making processes and provide explanations for the model outputs. Which AWS service or feature meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在使用AWS服务部署AI/ML模型。该公司希望提供对模型决策过程的透明度，并为模型输出提供解释。哪项AWS服务或功能满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Model Cards help provide transparency into AI/ML models by documenting key details such as model purpose, training data, performance metrics, and limitations. This documentation enables organizations to explain model outputs and decision-making processes, ensuring accountability and compliance with responsible AI principles.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker模型卡通过记录关键细节（如模型目的、训练数据、性能指标和局限性）来帮助提供AI/ML模型的透明度。这种文档使组织能够解释模型输出和决策过程，确保对负责任的AI原则的问责和合规。

models.Question.question_en: A company built an AI-powered resume screening system. The company used a large dataset to train the model. The dataset contained resumes that were not representative of all demographics. Which core dimension of responsible AI does this scenario present?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司建立了一个基于人工智能的简历筛选系统。该公司使用了一个大型数据集来训练模型。该数据集包含的简历并未代表所有人口统计特征。这个场景呈现了负责任的人工智能的哪个核心维度？
models.Question.explanation_en: The scenario describes a dataset that is not representative of all demographics, which can lead to biased model predictions. This directly relates to fairness, a core dimension of responsible AI that ensures AI systems make unbiased and equitable decisions across different demographic groups. Addressing fairness involves techniques such as balanced dataset curation, bias detection, and mitigation strategies to ensure that the AI system does not discriminate against any group.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 这个场景描述了一个不代表所有人口统计特征的数据集，这可能导致模型预测的偏见。这直接与公平性相关，这是负责任的人工智能的一个核心维度，确保人工智能系统在不同人口群体中做出无偏见和公平的决策。解决公平性问题涉及平衡数据集策划、偏见检测和缓解策略等技术，以确保人工智能系统不歧视任何群体。

models.Question.question_en: A global financial company has developed an ML application to analyze stock market data and provide stock market trends. The company wants to continuously monitor the application development phases and to ensure that company policies and industry regulations are followed. Which AWS services will help the company assess compliance requirements? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家全球金融公司开发了一款机器学习应用程序，用于分析股市数据并提供股市趋势。该公司希望持续监控应用程序开发阶段，并确保遵循公司政策和行业法规。哪些AWS服务将帮助公司评估合规性要求？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en: AWS Audit Manager helps organizations continuously assess and audit compliance with industry regulations and internal policies by automating evidence collection and generating audit reports. This is essential for ensuring that the ML application meets regulatory requirements. AWS Config enables continuous monitoring and compliance checks by tracking configuration changes in AWS resources. It helps the company ensure that infrastructure settings align with security policies and industry standards.
models.Question.explanation_cn: AWS审计管理器通过自动化证据收集和生成审计报告，帮助组织持续评估和审计与行业法规和内部政策的合规性。这对于确保机器学习应用程序满足监管要求至关重要。AWS配置通过跟踪AWS资源中的配置更改，实现持续监控和合规检查。它帮助公司确保基础设施设置与安全政策和行业标准保持一致。

models.Question.question_en: A media company wants to analyze viewer behavior and demographics to recommend personalized content. The company wants to deploy a customized ML model in its production environment. The company also wants to observe if the model quality drifts over time. Which AWS service or feature meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家媒体公司希望分析观众行为和人口统计数据，以推荐个性化内容。该公司希望在其生产环境中部署一个定制的机器学习模型。该公司还希望观察模型质量是否随时间漂移。哪项AWS服务或功能满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor continuously tracks deployed ML models in production to detect data drift, model drift, and quality degradation over time. This is essential for ensuring that the recommendation model remains accurate as viewer behavior and demographics change. Model Monitor helps detect anomalies and provides alerts when model performance deviates from expected trends, allowing the company to take corrective action.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon SageMaker Model Monitor持续跟踪在生产中部署的机器学习模型，以检测数据漂移、模型漂移和质量下降。这对于确保推荐模型在观众行为和人口统计数据变化时保持准确性至关重要。Model Monitor帮助检测异常，并在模型性能偏离预期趋势时提供警报，使公司能够采取纠正措施。

models.Question.question_en: A company deployed an AI/ML solution to help customer service agents respond to frequently asked questions. The questions can change over time. The company wants to give customer service agents the ability to ask questions and receive automatically generated answers to common customer questions. Which strategy will meet these requirements MOST cost-effectively?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司部署了一个人工智能/机器学习解决方案，以帮助客户服务代表回答常见问题。这些问题可能会随着时间的推移而变化。公司希望赋予客户服务代表提问的能力，并自动生成对常见客户问题的答案。哪种策略最具成本效益地满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) is a cost-effective approach that enhances AI-generated responses by retrieving relevant information from external knowledge sources. Instead of fine-tuning or re-training a model, RAG dynamically pulls the most recent and relevant data at query time. This is particularly useful in scenarios where questions change over time, ensuring that the AI/ML solution provides accurate and up-to-date responses without requiring expensive and time-consuming model retraining. Prompt engineering techniques further optimize how the model processes and generates responses, improving accuracy and relevance.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 检索增强生成（RAG）是一种具有成本效益的方法，通过从外部知识源检索相关信息来增强人工智能生成的响应。RAG在查询时动态提取最新和相关的数据，而不是微调或重新训练模型。这在问题随时间变化的情况下特别有用，确保人工智能/机器学习解决方案提供准确和最新的响应，而无需昂贵且耗时的模型重新训练。提示工程技术进一步优化模型处理和生成响应的方式，提高了准确性和相关性。

models.Question.question_en: Which scenario describes a potential risk and limitation of prompt engineering in the context of a generative AI model?
models.Question.question_cn: 在生成式人工智能模型的上下文中，哪种情况描述了提示工程的潜在风险和限制？
models.Question.explanation_en: A key risk in prompt engineering is prompt injection, where attackers manipulate input prompts to alter a model's behavior or produce unintended outputs. This vulnerability arises from the model's sensitivity to input structure and content, making it a critical limitation in secure prompt design.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 提示工程中的一个关键风险是提示注入，攻击者通过操纵输入提示来改变模型的行为或产生意外输出。这种脆弱性源于模型对输入结构和内容的敏感性，使其在安全提示设计中成为一个关键限制。

models.Question.question_en: What is tokenization used for in natural language processing (NLP)?
models.Question.question_cn: 在自然语言处理（NLP）中，分词的用途是什么？
models.Question.explanation_en: Tokenization is the process of dividing text into smaller units, such as words, subwords, or characters, which can then be analyzed or processed by NLP models. It is a foundational step in preparing text data for machine learning.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 分词是将文本划分为更小单位的过程，例如单词、子词或字符，这些单位可以被NLP模型分析或处理。这是为机器学习准备文本数据的基础步骤。

models.Question.question_en: Which option is a characteristic of transformer-based language models?
models.Question.question_cn: 以下哪个选项是基于变压器的语言模型的特征？
models.Question.explanation_en: A key characteristic of transformer models is their use of self-attention mechanisms, which allow the model to weigh the importance of different words in a sequence relative to each other, enabling a deep understanding of context and meaning across the entire input.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 变压器模型的一个关键特征是使用自注意力机制，这使得模型能够相对地权衡序列中不同单词的重要性，从而在整个输入中实现对上下文和意义的深刻理解。

models.Question.question_en: A medical company wants to develop an AI application that can access structured patient records, extract relevant information, and generate concise summaries. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家医疗公司希望开发一个能够访问结构化病人记录、提取相关信息并生成简明摘要的人工智能应用程序。哪种解决方案能够满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Comprehend Medical is specifically designed to extract structured medical information (such as medication, condition, test results) from unstructured text. By applying rule-based logic afterward, relevant data can be formatted into concise summaries, meeting both the extraction and summarization needs.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Comprehend Medical 专门设计用于从非结构化文本中提取结构化医疗信息（如药物、病情、测试结果）。通过随后应用基于规则的逻辑，可以将相关数据格式化为简明摘要，满足提取和总结的需求。

models.Question.question_en:
A financial company is using ML to help with some of the company’s tasks.
Which option is a use of generative AI models?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家金融公司正在使用机器学习来帮助公司的一些任务。
以下哪个选项是生成性人工智能模型的应用？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Generative AI models are designed to generate new content such as text, images, or audio. Summarizing
customer complaints involves generating concise versions of longer texts, which is a task well-suited for
generative AI models like large language models.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 生成性人工智能模型旨在生成新的内容，如文本、图像或音频。总结客户投诉涉及生成较长文本的简洁版本，这是一项非常适合生成性人工智能模型（如大型语言模型）的任务。

models.Question.question_en: A company is building an AI application to summarize books of varying lengths. During testing, the application fails to summarize some books. Why does the application fail to summarize some books?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在开发一款人工智能应用程序来总结不同长度的书籍。在测试过程中，该应用程序未能总结一些书籍。为什么应用程序未能总结一些书籍？
models.Question.explanation_en: Language models have a maximum context size, which limits the number of input tokens they can process at once. If a book's length exceeds this limit, the model cannot handle the full input, leading to failure in summarization.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 语言模型具有最大上下文大小，这限制了它们一次处理的输入标记数量。如果一本书的长度超过了这个限制，模型无法处理完整的输入，导致总结失败。

models.Question.question_en: Which option describes embeddings in the context of AI?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪个选项描述了AI中嵌入的概念？
models.Question.explanation_en: Embeddings are numerical representations of data, such as words, images, or items, in a lower-dimensional vector space. They capture semantic relationships and patterns in the data, enabling models to process and compare inputs efficiently.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 嵌入是数据的数值表示，例如单词、图像或项目，在较低维度的向量空间中。它们捕捉数据中的语义关系和模式，使模型能够高效地处理和比较输入。

models.Question.question_en: A company uses Amazon Bedrock for its generative AI application. The company wants to use Amazon Bedrock Guardrails to detect and filter harmful user inputs and model-generated outputs. Which content categories can the guardrails filter? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司使用 Amazon Bedrock 来开发其生成式 AI 应用程序。该公司希望使用 Amazon Bedrock Guardrails 来检测和过滤有害的用户输入和模型生成的输出。Guardrails 可以过滤哪些内容类别？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock Guardrails provide configurable content filters to detect and block harmful content in generative AI applications. Specifically, they include filters for categories such as Hate and Violence, among others. These filters can be applied to both user inputs and model-generated outputs to ensure that the AI application adheres to responsible AI practices and organizational policies.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock Guardrails 提供可配置的内容过滤器，以检测和阻止生成式 AI 应用程序中的有害内容。具体而言，它们包括针对仇恨和暴力等类别的过滤器。这些过滤器可以应用于用户输入和模型生成的输出，以确保 AI 应用程序遵循负责任的 AI 实践和组织政策。

models.Question.question_en: An airline company wants to build a conversational AI assistant to answer customer questions about flight schedules, booking, and payments. The company wants to use large language models (LLMs) and a knowledge base to create a text-based chatbot interface. Which solution will meet these requirements with the LEAST development effort?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家航空公司希望建立一个对话式人工智能助手，以回答客户关于航班时间表、预订和支付的问题。该公司希望使用大型语言模型（LLMs）和知识库来创建一个基于文本的聊天机器人界面。哪种解决方案可以以最少的开发工作满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Amazon Bedrock allows quick integration of large language models with a knowledge base using RAG architecture, enabling accurate and dynamic responses based on up-to-date information. This approach requires minimal development effort while leveraging powerful generative capabilities.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Amazon Bedrock允许使用RAG架构快速将大型语言模型与知识库集成，从而根据最新信息提供准确和动态的响应。这种方法在利用强大的生成能力的同时，所需的开发工作量最小。

models.Question.question_en: A financial company is using AI systems to obtain customer credit scores as part of the loan application process. The company wants to expand to a new market in a different geographic area. The company must ensure that it can operate in that geographic area. Which compliance laws should the company review?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家金融公司正在使用人工智能系统获取客户信用评分，作为贷款申请过程的一部分。该公司希望扩展到一个不同地理区域的新市场。该公司必须确保能够在该地理区域内运营。该公司应该审查哪些合规法律？
models.Question.explanation_en: When deploying AI systems that affect individuals, such as credit scoring, companies must comply with local algorithm accountability laws. These laws regulate the fairness, transparency, and impact of automated decision-making, ensuring ethical use of AI in new geographic regions.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在部署影响个人的人工智能系统时，例如信用评分，公司必须遵守当地算法问责法律。这些法律规范自动决策的公平性、透明度和影响，确保在新地理区域内的人工智能的伦理使用。

models.Question.question_en: Which technique breaks a complex task into smaller subtasks that are sent sequentially to a large language model (LLM)?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪种技术将复杂任务分解为较小的子任务，并将其顺序发送给大型语言模型（LLM）？
models.Question.explanation_en: Prompt chaining involves breaking a complex task into smaller, manageable subtasks and passing them sequentially to a large language model. Each step builds upon the previous one, enabling more structured reasoning and improved task execution.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 提示链涉及将复杂任务分解为较小的、可管理的子任务，并将它们顺序传递给大型语言模型。每一步都建立在前一步的基础上，从而实现更结构化的推理和改进的任务执行。

models.Question.question_en: An AI practitioner needs to improve the accuracy of a natural language generation model. The model uses rapidly changing inventory data. Which technique will improve the model's accuracy?
models.Question.question_cn: 一位人工智能从业者需要提高自然语言生成模型的准确性。该模型使用快速变化的库存数据。哪种技术可以提高模型的准确性？
models.Question.explanation_en: RAG enhances a language model by fetching up-to-date, domain-specific data (e.g., current inventory) at inference time and conditioning the generation on those facts, ensuring the output reflects the latest information and improving accuracy without retraining the core model.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 检索增强生成（RAG）通过在推理时获取最新的、特定领域的数据（例如当前库存）并基于这些事实进行生成，从而增强语言模型，确保输出反映最新信息，并在不重新训练核心模型的情况下提高准确性。

models.Question.question_en: A company wants to collaborate with several research institutes to develop an AI model. The company needs standardized documentation of model version tracking and a record of model development. Which solution meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司希望与多个研究机构合作开发一个人工智能模型。该公司需要标准化的模型版本跟踪文档和模型开发记录。哪种解决方案满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: SageMaker Model Cards provide a built-in framework for capturing and versioning key metadata, such as training data details, performance metrics, lineage, and intended use, for each model iteration. This standardized documentation and history of development fulfills requirements for model version tracking and auditable records.
models.Question.explanation_cn: SageMaker模型卡提供了一个内置框架，用于捕获和版本化关键元数据，例如每个模型迭代的训练数据详细信息、性能指标、来源和预期用途。这个标准化的文档和开发历史满足了模型版本跟踪和可审计记录的要求。

models.Question.question_en: A publishing company built a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) based solution to give its users the ability to interact with published content. New content is published daily. The company wants to provide a near real-time experience to users. Which steps in the RAG pipeline should the company implement by using offline batch processing to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
models.Question.question_cn: 一家出版公司建立了一个基于检索增强生成（RAG）的解决方案，以使其用户能够与已发布的内容进行互动。新内容每天发布。该公司希望为用户提供近乎实时的体验。为了满足这些要求，该公司应该在RAG管道中实施哪些步骤，使用离线批处理？（选择两个。）
models.Question.explanation_en: In a RAG pipeline, generating content embeddings and creating the search index can be done offline in batch processes because they involve static published content. This enables the system to be updated periodically without affecting real-time user interactions. User queries and response generation, on the other hand, must occur in real time.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 在RAG管道中，生成内容嵌入和创建搜索索引可以在离线批处理中完成，因为它们涉及静态已发布内容。这使得系统可以定期更新，而不影响实时用户交互。另一方面，用户查询和响应生成必须实时进行。

models.Question.question_en: A company deployed a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) application on Amazon Bedrock that gathers financial news to distribute in daily newsletters. Users have recently reported politically influenced ideas in the newsletters. Which Amazon Bedrock guardrail can identify and filter this content?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司在亚马逊Bedrock上部署了一个检索增强生成（RAG）应用程序，该程序收集金融新闻以分发到每日通讯中。用户最近报告了通讯中存在政治影响的观点。哪个亚马逊Bedrock的保护措施可以识别和过滤这些内容？
models.Question.explanation_en: The Denied topics guardrail lets you define high-level categories (such as politics) that the model must avoid. Bedrock enforces these rules during generation, filtering out any content related to politically influenced ideas.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 拒绝主题的保护措施允许您定义模型必须避免的高层次类别（例如政治）。Bedrock在生成过程中执行这些规则，过滤掉与政治影响观点相关的任何内容。

models.Question.question_en: A company is developing an editorial assistant application that uses generative AI. During the pilot phase, usage is low and application performance is not a concern. The company cannot predict application usage after the application is fully deployed and wants to minimize application costs. Which solution will meet these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家公司正在开发一个使用生成性人工智能的编辑助手应用程序。在试点阶段，使用率较低，应用程序性能不是问题。公司无法预测应用程序全面部署后的使用情况，并希望尽量减少应用程序成本。哪种解决方案可以满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: On-Demand Throughput in Bedrock charges only for the inference calls you actually make, with no upfront capacity commitment. This lets you start with minimal pilot usage and elastically handle unpredictable future load while keeping costs as low as possible.
models.Question.explanation_cn: Bedrock的按需吞吐量仅对您实际进行的推理调用收费，无需预先承诺容量。这使您可以从最小的试点使用开始，并灵活处理不可预测的未来负载，同时将成本保持在尽可能低的水平。

models.Question.question_en: What is the purpose of chunking in Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)?
models.Question.question_cn: 在检索增强生成（RAG）中，分块的目的是什么？
models.Question.explanation_en: By splitting large documents into smaller, semantically coherent chunks, the retrieval system can match and return only the most context-relevant segments for a given query, enhancing the precision and accuracy of the generated responses.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 通过将大型文档拆分为更小的、语义上连贯的块，检索系统可以匹配并仅返回与给定查询最相关的上下文片段，从而提高生成响应的精确度和准确性。

models.Question.question_en:
A company designed an AI-powered agent to answer customer inquiries based on product manuals.
Which strategy can improve customer confidence levels in the AI-powered agent's responses?
models.Question.question_cn:
一家公司设计了一个基于产品手册回答客户咨询的人工智能代理。
哪种策略可以提高客户对人工智能代理回答的信心水平？
models.Question.explanation_en:
Providing direct links to the exact sections of the product manual that support each answer lets customers
verify and trust the information, boosting confidence in the AI agent’s responses.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 提供直接链接到支持每个答案的产品手册的确切部分，让客户能够验证和信任信息，从而增强对人工智能代理回答的信心。

models.Question.question_en: A company that uses multiple ML models wants to identify changes in original model quality so that the company can resolve any issues. Which AWS service or feature meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家使用多个机器学习模型的公司希望识别原始模型质量的变化，以便公司能够解决任何问题。哪个AWS服务或功能满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: SageMaker Model Monitor continuously measures data and prediction quality in production, detects deviations from your model’s baseline (such as data drift or accuracy degradation), and alerts you so you can investigate and resolve issues promptly.
models.Question.explanation_cn: SageMaker模型监控持续测量生产中的数据和预测质量，检测与模型基线的偏差（例如数据漂移或准确性下降），并提醒您以便您可以及时调查和解决问题。

models.Question.question_en: A financial company is developing a fraud detection system that flags potential fraud cases in credit card transactions. Employees will evaluate the flagged fraud cases. The company wants to minimize the amount of time the employees spend reviewing flagged fraud cases that are not actually fraudulent. Which evaluation metric meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家金融公司正在开发一种欺诈检测系统，用于标记信用卡交易中的潜在欺诈案例。员工将评估被标记为欺诈的案例。该公司希望最大程度地减少员工花在审核实际上并非欺诈案例的被标记欺诈案例上的时间。哪种评估指标符合这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Precision measures the proportion of flagged cases that are truly fraudulent (TP / [TP + FP]). Maximizing precision reduces the number of false positives employees must review, cutting down wasted effort on non-fraudulent cases.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 精确率衡量被标记为欺诈的案例中真正欺诈的比例（TP / [TP + FP]）。最大化精确率可以减少员工需要审核的误报案例数量，从而减少在非欺诈案例上浪费的努力。

models.Question.question_en: A manufacturing company has an application that ingests consumer complaints from publicly available sources. The application uses complex hard-coded logic to process the complaints. The company wants to scale this logic across markets and product lines. Which advantage do generative AI models offer for this scenario?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家制造公司有一个应用程序，可以从公开可用的来源获取消费者投诉。该应用程序使用复杂的硬编码逻辑来处理投诉。公司希望在不同市场和产品线之间扩展这一逻辑。生成式人工智能模型在这种情况下提供了什么优势？
models.Question.explanation_en: Generative AI models can generalize learned patterns to new domains and formats with minimal manual reconfiguration. This adaptability lets you extend complaint-processing logic across different markets and product lines without rewriting complex hard-coded rules.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 生成式人工智能模型可以将学习到的模式推广到新的领域和格式，几乎不需要手动重新配置。这种适应性使您能够在不同市场和产品线之间扩展投诉处理逻辑，而无需重写复杂的硬编码规则。

models.Question.question_en: A hospital developed an AI system to provide personalized treatment recommendations for patients. The AI system must provide the rationale behind the recommendations and make the insights accessible to doctors and patients. Which human-centered design principle does this scenario present?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家医院开发了一个人工智能系统，为患者提供个性化的治疗建议。该人工智能系统必须提供建议背后的理由，并使医生和患者能够获取这些见解。这个场景呈现了哪个以人为本的设计原则？
models.Question.explanation_en: Explainability ensures that the AI system reveals the reasoning behind its recommendations in an understandable way, making insights transparent and accessible to both doctors and patients.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 可解释性确保人工智能系统以可理解的方式揭示其建议背后的推理，使见解对医生和患者透明且可获取。

models.Question.question_en: Which statement presents an advantage of using Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) for natural language processing (NLP) tasks?
models.Question.question_cn: 以下哪个陈述展示了使用检索增强生成（RAG）在自然语言处理（NLP）任务中的优势？
models.Question.explanation_en: By retrieving relevant documents or data at inference time and conditioning the generation on that external knowledge, RAG enriches model outputs with up-to-date, domain-specific information, boosting accuracy and informativeness without retraining the core model.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 通过在推理时检索相关文档或数据，并基于该外部知识进行生成，RAG使模型输出丰富了最新的、特定领域的信息，提高了准确性和信息量，而无需重新训练核心模型。

models.Question.question_en: Which option is a benefit of using infrastructure as code (IaC) in machine learning operations (MLOps)?
models.Question.question_cn: 在机器学习操作（MLOps）中，使用基础设施即代码（IaC）的好处是什么？
models.Question.explanation_en: By describing infrastructure in code, teams can version, automate, and repeatably provision resources, ensuring that ML training and inference environments are consistent, scalable, and easy to reproduce across development, testing, and production.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 通过用代码描述基础设施，团队可以对资源进行版本控制、自动化和重复性配置，确保机器学习训练和推理环境在开发、测试和生产中是一致的、可扩展的，并且易于重现。

models.Question.question_en: A financial company wants to flag all credit card activity as possibly fraudulent or non-fraudulent based on transaction data. Which type of ML model meets these requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 一家金融公司希望根据交易数据将所有信用卡活动标记为可能的欺诈或非欺诈。哪种类型的机器学习模型满足这些要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Binary classification models are designed to distinguish between two classes - fraudulent versus non-fraudulent transactions - making them the appropriate choice for this use case.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 二分类模型旨在区分两类 - 欺诈交易与非欺诈交易 - 因此它们是此用例的合适选择。

models.Question.question_en: Which technique involves training AI models on labeled datasets to adapt the models to specific industry terminology and requirements?
models.Question.question_cn: 哪种技术涉及在标记数据集上训练人工智能模型，以使模型适应特定行业术语和要求？
models.Question.explanation_en: Fine-tuning takes a pre-trained model and continues training it on a labeled, domain-specific dataset so the model learns industry terminology and task nuances directly from that specialized data.
models.Question.explanation_cn: 微调是指在一个预训练模型的基础上，继续在一个标记的、特定领域的数据集上进行训练，以便模型能够直接从这些专业数据中学习行业术语和任务细微差别。
